30 #include <boost/multi_index/composite_key.hpp>

32 #include <boost/assert.hpp>

34 #include <mqtt/any.hpp>
35 #include <mqtt/fixed_header.hpp>
36 #include <mqtt/remaining_length.hpp>
37 #include <mqtt/utf8encoded_strings.hpp>
38 #include <mqtt/connect_flags.hpp>
39 #include <mqtt/encoded_length.hpp>
40 #include <mqtt/will.hpp>
41 #include <mqtt/session_present.hpp>
42 #include <mqtt/qos.hpp>

44 #include <mqtt/connect_return_code.hpp>
45 #include <mqtt/exception.hpp>

48 #include <mqtt/shared_scope_guard.hpp>

50 #include <mqtt/two_byte_util.hpp>
51 #include <mqtt/four_byte_util.hpp>
52 #include <mqtt/packet_id_type.hpp>
53 #include <mqtt/optional.hpp>
54 #include <mqtt/property_variant.hpp>
55 #include <mqtt/property_parse.hpp>
56 #include <mqtt/protocol_version.hpp>
57 #include <mqtt/reason_code.hpp>

60 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
61 #include <mqtt/ws_endpoint.hpp>
62 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
63 
64 namespace mqtt {
65 
66 namespace as = boost::asio;
67 namespace mi = boost::multi_index;
68 
69 template <typename Socket, typename Mutex = std::mutex, template<typename...> class LockGuard = std::lock_guard, std::size_t PacketIdBytes = 2>
70 class endpoint : public std::enable_shared_from_this<endpoint<Socket, Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>> {
71  using this_type = endpoint<Socket, Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>;
72 public:
73  using async_handler_t = std::function<void(boost::system::error_code const& ec)>;
74  using packet_id_t = typename packet_id_type<PacketIdBytes>::type;
75 
79  endpoint(protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined)
80  :h_mqtt_message_processed_(
81  [this]
82  (async_handler_t func) {
83  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
84  }
85  ),
86  version_(version)
87  {}
88 
93  explicit endpoint(std::unique_ptr<Socket> socket, protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined)
94  :socket_(std::move(socket))
95  ,connected_(true)
96  ,h_mqtt_message_processed_(
97  [this]
98  (async_handler_t func) {
99  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
100  }
101  ),
102  version_(version)
103  {}
104 
105  // MQTT Common handlers
106 
113  using pingreq_handler = std::function<bool()>;
114 
121  using pingresp_handler = std::function<bool()>;
122 
123 
124  // MQTT v3_1_1 handlers
125 
163  using connect_handler = std::function<
164  bool(std::string const& client_id,
165  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& username,
166  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
167  mqtt::optional<will> will,
168  bool clean_session,
169  std::uint16_t keep_alive)>;
170 
183  using connack_handler = std::function<bool(bool session_present, std::uint8_t return_code)>;
201  using publish_handler = std::function<bool(std::uint8_t fixed_header,
202  mqtt::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id,
203  std::string topic_name,
204  std::string contents)>;
205 
214  using puback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
215 
224  using pubrec_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
225 
234  using pubrel_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
235 
244  using pubcomp_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
245 
256  using subscribe_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
257  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> entries)>;
258 
270  using suback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
271  std::vector<mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t>> qoss)>;
272 
283  using unsubscribe_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
284  std::vector<std::string> topics)>;
285 
293  using unsuback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t)>;
294 
300  using disconnect_handler = std::function<void()>;
301 
302  // MQTT v5 handlers
303 
347  using v5_connect_handler = std::function<
348  bool(std::string const& client_id,
349  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& username,
350  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
351  mqtt::optional<will> will,
352  bool clean_start,
353  std::uint16_t keep_alive,
354  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
355  >;
356 
373  using v5_connack_handler = std::function<
374  bool(bool session_present,
375  std::uint8_t reason_code,
376  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
377  >;
378 
404  using v5_publish_handler = std::function<
405  bool(std::uint8_t fixed_header,
406  mqtt::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id,
407  std::string topic_name,
408  std::string contents,
409  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
410  >;
411 
428  using v5_puback_handler = std::function<
429  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
430  std::uint8_t reason_code,
431  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
432  >;
433 
450  using v5_pubrec_handler = std::function<
451  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
452  std::uint8_t reason_code,
453  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
454  >;
455 
472  using v5_pubrel_handler = std::function<
473  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
474  std::uint8_t reason_code,
475  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
476  >;
477 
494  using v5_pubcomp_handler = std::function<
495  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
496  std::uint8_t reason_code,
497  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
498  >;
499 
514  using v5_subscribe_handler = std::function<
515  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
516  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> entries,
517  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
518  >;
519 
535  using v5_suback_handler = std::function<
536  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
537  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons,
538  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
539  >;
540 
556  using v5_unsubscribe_handler = std::function<
557  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
558  std::vector<std::string> topics,
559  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
560  >;
561 
577  using v5_unsuback_handler = std::function<
578  bool(packet_id_t,
579  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons,
580  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
581  >;
582 
596  using v5_disconnect_handler = std::function<
597  void(std::uint8_t reason_code,
598  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
599  >;
600 
615  using v5_auth_handler = std::function<
616  bool(std::uint8_t reason_code,
617  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
618  >;
619 
620 
621  // Original handlers
622 
629  using close_handler = std::function<void()>;
630 
638  using error_handler = std::function<void(boost::system::error_code const& ec)>;
639 
648  using pub_res_sent_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
649 
656  using serialize_publish_message_handler = std::function<void(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
657 
664  using serialize_v5_publish_message_handler = std::function<void(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
665 
674  using serialize_publish_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id, char const* data, std::size_t size)>;
675 
684  using serialize_pubrel_message_handler = std::function<void(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
685 
694  using serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler = std::function<void(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
695 
706  using serialize_pubrel_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id, char const* data, std::size_t size)>;
707 
712  using serialize_remove_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
713 
718  using pre_send_handler = std::function<void()>;
719 
727  using is_valid_length_handler =
728  std::function<bool(std::uint8_t control_packet_type, std::size_t remaining_length)>;
729 
735  using mqtt_message_processed_handler =
736  std::function<void(async_handler_t func)>;
737 
738  endpoint(this_type const&) = delete;
739  endpoint(this_type&&) = delete;
740  endpoint& operator=(this_type const&) = delete;
741  endpoint& operator=(this_type&&) = delete;
742 
751  bool clean_session() const {
752  return clean_session_;
753  }
754 
763  bool clean_start() const {
764  return clean_session();
765  }
766 
774  void set_auto_pub_response(bool b = true, bool async = true) {
775  auto_pub_response_ = b;
776  auto_pub_response_async_ = async;
777  }
778

786  void set_pingreq_handler(pingreq_handler h = pingreq_handler()) {
787  h_pingreq_ = std::move(h);
788  }
789 
794  void set_pingresp_handler(pingresp_handler h = pingresp_handler()) {
795  h_pingresp_ = std::move(h);
796  }

805  }

812  return h_pingresp_;
813  }

1253  void set_serialize_handlers(
1254  serialize_publish_message_handler h_publish,
1255  serialize_pubrel_message_handler h_pubrel,
1256  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1257  h_serialize_publish_ = std::move(h_publish);
1258  h_serialize_pubrel_ = std::move(h_pubrel);
1259  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1260  }
1261 
1268  void set_v5_serialize_handlers(
1269  serialize_v5_publish_message_handler h_publish,
1270  serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler h_pubrel,
1271  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1272  h_serialize_v5_publish_ = std::move(h_publish);
1273  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ = std::move(h_pubrel);
1274  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1275  }
1276 
1283  void set_serialize_handlers(
1284  serialize_publish_handler h_publish,
1285  serialize_pubrel_handler h_pubrel,
1286  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1287  h_serialize_publish_ =
1288  [h_publish = std::move(h_publish)]
1289  (basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1290  if (h_publish) {
1291  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1292  h_publish(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1293  }
1294  };
1295  h_serialize_pubrel_ =
1296  [h_pubrel = std::move(h_pubrel)]
1297  (basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1298  if (h_pubrel) {
1299  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1300  h_pubrel(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1301  }
1302  };
1303  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1304  }
1305 
1312  void set_v5_serialize_handlers(
1313  serialize_publish_handler h_publish,
1314  serialize_pubrel_handler h_pubrel,
1315  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1316  h_serialize_v5_publish_ =
1317  [h_publish = std::move(h_publish)]
1318  (v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1319  if (h_publish) {
1320  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1321  h_publish(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1322  }
1323  };
1324  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ =
1325  [h_pubrel = std::move(h_pubrel)]
1326  (v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1327  if (h_pubrel) {
1328  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1329  h_pubrel(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1330  }
1331  };
1332  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1333  }
1334 
1338  void set_serialize_handlers() {
1339  h_serialize_publish_ = serialize_publish_message_handler();
1340  h_serialize_pubrel_ = serialize_pubrel_message_handler();
1341  h_serialize_v5_publish_ = serialize_v5_publish_message_handler();
1342  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ = serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler();
1343  h_serialize_remove_ = serialize_remove_handler();
1344  }
1345 
1350  void set_pre_send_handler(pre_send_handler h = pre_send_handler()) {
1351  h_pre_send_ = std::move(h);
1352  }
1353 
1358  void set_is_valid_length_handler(is_valid_length_handler h = is_valid_length_handler()) {
1359  h_is_valid_length_ = std::move(h);
1360  }

1434  }
1435 
1440  is_valid_length_handler const& get_is_valid_length_handler() const {
1441  return h_is_valid_length_;
1442  }
1443 
1444 
1450  void start_session(async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()) {
1451  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
1452  }
1453 
1454  // Blocking APIs
1455 
1471  void publish_at_most_once(
1472  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
1473  mqtt::string_view contents,
1474  bool retain = false,
1475  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1476  ) {
1477  publish_at_most_once(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()),
1478  as::buffer(contents.data(), contents.size()),
1479  retain,
1480  std::move(props));
1481  }
1482 
1498  void publish_at_most_once(
1499  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1500  as::const_buffer contents,
1501  bool retain = false,
1502  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1503  ) {
1504  acquired_publish(0, topic_name, contents, mqtt::any(), qos::at_most_once, retain, std::move(props));
1505  }
1506 
1524  packet_id_t publish_at_least_once(
1525  std::string topic_name,
1526  std::string contents,
1527  bool retain = false,
1528  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1529  ) {
1530  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1531  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1532 
1533  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1534  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1535 
1536  return publish_at_least_once(topic_buf,
1537  contents_buf,
1538  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)),
1539  retain,
1540  std::move(props));
1541  }
1542 
1562  packet_id_t publish_at_least_once(
1563  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1564  as::const_buffer contents,
1565  mqtt::any life_keeper,
1566  bool retain = false,
1567  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1568  ) {
1569  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1570  acquired_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
1571  return packet_id;
1572  }
1573 
1591  packet_id_t publish_exactly_once(
1592  std::string topic_name,
1593  std::string contents,
1594  bool retain = false,
1595  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1596  ) {
1597  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1598  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1599 
1600  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1601  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1602 
1603  return publish_exactly_once(topic_buf,
1604  contents_buf,
1605  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)),
1606  retain,
1607  std::move(props));
1608  }
1609 
1629  packet_id_t publish_exactly_once(
1630  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1631  as::const_buffer contents,
1632  mqtt::any life_keeper,
1633  bool retain = false,
1634  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1635  ) {
1636  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1637  acquired_publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
1638  return packet_id;
1639  }
1640 
1663  packet_id_t publish(
1664  std::string topic_name,
1665  std::string contents,
1666  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
1667  bool retain = false,
1668  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1669  ) {
1670  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
1671  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
1672  {
1673  publish_at_most_once(std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(props));
1674  return 0;
1675  }
1676  else
1677  {
1678  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1679  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1680 
1681  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1682  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1683 
1684  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1685  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), qos, retain, std::move(props));
1686  return packet_id;
1687  }
1688  }
1689 
1714  packet_id_t publish(
1715  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1716  as::const_buffer contents,
1717  mqtt::any life_keeper,
1718  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
1719  bool retain = false,
1720  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1721  ) {
1722  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
1723  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
1724  {
1725  publish_at_most_once(topic_name, contents, retain, std::move(props));
1726  return 0;
1727  }
1728  else
1729  {
1730  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1731  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), qos, retain, std::move(props));
1732  return packet_id;
1733  }
1734  }
1735 
1754  template <typename... Args>
1755  packet_id_t subscribe(
1756  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
1757  std::uint8_t option,
1758  Args&&... args) {
1759  BOOST_ASSERT(
1760  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::at_most_once ||
1761  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::at_least_once ||
1762  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::exactly_once
1763  );
1764  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1765  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), option, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1766  return packet_id;
1767  }
1768 
1787  template <typename... Args>
1788  packet_id_t subscribe(
1789  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1790  std::uint8_t option,
1791  Args&&... args) {
1792  BOOST_ASSERT(
1793  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::at_most_once ||
1794  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::at_least_once ||
1795  subscribe::get_qos(option) == qos::exactly_once
1796  );
1797  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1798  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1799  return packet_id;
1800  }
1801 
1816  packet_id_t subscribe(
1817  std::vector<std::tuple<mqtt::string_view, std::uint8_t>> const& params,
1818  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1819  ) {
1820  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1821  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> asio_params;
1822  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
1823  for(auto const& p : params)
1824  {
1825  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(p).data(), std::get<0>(p).size()), std::get<1>(p));
1826  }
1827  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(asio_params), std::move(props));
1828  return packet_id;
1829  }
1830 
1845  packet_id_t subscribe(
1846  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
1847  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1848  ) {
1849  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1850  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(params), std::move(props));
1851  return packet_id;
1852  }
1853 
1866  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1867  std::vector<mqtt::string_view> const& params,
1868  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1869  ) {
1870  std::vector<as::const_buffer> asio_params;
1871  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
1872  for(auto const& p : params)
1873  {
1874  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(p.data(), p.size()));
1875  }
1876  return unsubscribe(std::move(asio_params), std::move(props));
1877  }
1878 
1891  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1892  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
1893  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1894  ) {
1895  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1896  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(params), std::move(props));
1897  return packet_id;
1898  }
1899 
1914  template <typename... Args>
1915  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1916  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
1917  Args&&... args) {
1918  return unsubscribe(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1919  }
1920 
1935  template <typename... Args>
1936  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1937  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1938  Args&&... args) {
1939  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1940  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1941  return packet_id;
1942  }
1943 
1959  void disconnect(
1960  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
1961  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1962  ) {
1963  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
1964  disconnect_requested_ = true;
1965  send_disconnect(reason, std::move(props));
1966  }
1967  }
1968 
1974  void force_disconnect() {
1975  connected_ = false;
1976  mqtt_connected_ = false;
1977  shutdown_from_client(*socket_);
1978  }
1979 
1980  // packet_id manual setting version
1981 
2001  bool publish_at_least_once(
2002  packet_id_t packet_id,
2003  std::string topic_name,
2004  std::string contents,
2005  bool retain = false,
2006  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2007  ) {
2008  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2009  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2010 
2011  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
2012  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2013 
2014  return publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), retain, std::move(props));
2015  }
2016 
2038  bool publish_at_least_once(
2039  packet_id_t packet_id,
2040  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2041  as::const_buffer contents,
2042  mqtt::any life_keeper,
2043  bool retain = false,
2044  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2045  ) {
2046  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2047  acquired_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
2048  return true;
2049  }
2050  return false;
2051  }

2073  packet_id_t packet_id,
2074  std::string topic_name,
2075  std::string contents,
2076  bool retain = false,
2077  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2078  ) {
2079  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2080  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2081 
2082  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
2083  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2084 
2085  return publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), retain, std::move(props));
2086  }

2223  bool publish_dup(
2224  packet_id_t packet_id,
2225  std::string topic_name,
2226  std::string contents,
2227  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2228  bool retain = false,
2229  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2230  ) {

2232  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2233 
2234  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
2235  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2236 
2237  return publish_dup(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), qos, retain, std::move(props));
2238  }

2299  bool subscribe(
2300  packet_id_t packet_id,
2301  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
2302  std::uint8_t qos,
2303  Args&&... args) {
2304  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2305  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2306  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2307  return true;
2308  }
2309  return false;
2310  }

2361  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2362  ) {

2366  for(auto const& p : params)

2369  }

2515 
2516  // packet_id has already been acquired version
2517 
2536  void acquired_publish_at_least_once(
2537  packet_id_t packet_id,
2538  std::string topic_name,
2539  std::string contents,
2540  bool retain = false,
2541  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2542  ) {
2543 
2544  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2545  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2546 
2547  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2548  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2549 
2550  send_publish(
2551  topic_buf,
2552  qos::at_least_once,
2553  retain,
2554  false,
2555  packet_id,
2556  std::move(props),
2557  contents_buf,
2558  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
2559  );
2560  }
2561 
2582  void acquired_publish_at_least_once(
2583  packet_id_t packet_id,
2584  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2585  as::const_buffer contents,
2586  mqtt::any life_keeper,
2587  bool retain = false,
2588  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2589  ) {
2590  BOOST_ASSERT(packet_id != 0);
2591  send_publish(
2592  topic_name,
2593  qos::at_least_once,
2594  retain,
2595  false,
2596  packet_id,
2597  std::move(props),
2598  contents,
2599  std::move(life_keeper)
2600  );
2601  }
2602 
2621  void acquired_publish_exactly_once(
2622  packet_id_t packet_id,
2623  std::string topic_name,
2624  std::string contents,
2625  bool retain = false,
2626  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2627  ) {
2628 
2629  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2630  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2631 
2632  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2633  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2634 
2635  send_publish(
2636  topic_buf,
2637  qos::exactly_once,
2638  retain,
2639  false,
2640  packet_id,
2641  std::move(props),
2642  contents_buf,
2643  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
2644  );
2645  }
2646 
2667  void acquired_publish_exactly_once(
2668  packet_id_t packet_id,
2669  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2670  as::const_buffer contents,
2671  mqtt::any life_keeper,
2672  bool retain = false,
2673  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2674  ) {
2675 
2676  send_publish(
2677  topic_name,
2678  qos::exactly_once,
2679  retain,
2680  false,
2681  packet_id,
2682  std::move(props),
2683  contents,
2684  std::move(life_keeper)
2685  );
2686  }
2687 
2709  void acquired_publish(
2710  packet_id_t packet_id,
2711  std::string topic_name,
2712  std::string contents,
2713  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2714  bool retain = false,
2715  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2716  ) {
2717  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2718  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2719 
2720  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2721  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2722 
2723  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2724  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2725 
2726  send_publish(
2727  topic_buf,
2728  qos,
2729  retain,
2730  false,
2731  packet_id,
2732  std::move(props),
2733  contents_buf,
2734  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
2735  );
2736  }
2737 
2761  void acquired_publish(
2762  packet_id_t packet_id,
2763  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2764  as::const_buffer contents,
2765  mqtt::any life_keeper,
2766  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2767  bool retain = false,
2768  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2769  ) {
2770  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2771  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2772 
2773  send_publish(
2774  topic_name,
2775  qos,
2776  retain,
2777  false,
2778  packet_id,
2779  std::move(props),
2780  contents,
2781  std::move(life_keeper)
2782  );
2783  }
2784 
2806  void acquired_publish_dup(
2807  packet_id_t packet_id,
2808  std::string topic_name,
2809  std::string contents,
2810  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2811  bool retain = false,
2812  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2813  ) {
2814  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2815  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2816 
2817  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2818  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2819 
2820  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2821  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2822 
2823  send_publish(
2824  topic_buf,
2825  qos,
2826  retain,
2827  true,
2828  packet_id,
2829  std::move(props),
2830  contents_buf,
2831  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
2832  );
2833  }
2834 
2858  void acquired_publish_dup(
2859  packet_id_t packet_id,
2860  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2861  as::const_buffer contents,
2862  mqtt::any life_keeper,
2863  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2864  bool retain = false,
2865  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2866  ) {
2867  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2868  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2869 
2870  send_publish(
2871  topic_name,
2872  qos,
2873  retain,
2874  true,
2875  packet_id,
2876  std::move(props),
2877  contents,
2878  std::move(life_keeper)
2879  );
2880  }
2881 
2900  template <typename... Args>
2901  void acquired_subscribe(
2902  packet_id_t packet_id,
2903  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
2904  std::uint8_t qos, Args&&... args) {
2905  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2906  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
2907  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
2908  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2909  }
2910 
2928  template <typename... Args>
2929  void acquired_subscribe(
2930  packet_id_t packet_id,
2931  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2932  std::uint8_t qos, Args&&... args) {
2933  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2934  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
2935  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
2936  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, topic_name, qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2937  }
2938 
2952  void acquired_subscribe(
2953  packet_id_t packet_id,
2954  std::vector<std::tuple<mqtt::string_view, std::uint8_t>> params,
2955  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2956  ) {
2957  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
2958  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
2959  for (auto const& e : params) {
2960  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(e).data(), std::get<0>(e).size()), std::get<1>(e));
2961  }
2962  send_subscribe(std::move(cb_params), packet_id, std::move(props));
2963  }
2964 
2978  void acquired_subscribe(
2979  packet_id_t packet_id,
2980  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
2981  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2982  ) {
2983  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props));
2984  }
2985 
3001  template <typename... Args>
3002  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3003  packet_id_t packet_id,
3004  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
3005  Args&&... args) {
3006  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
3007  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
3008  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3009  }
3010 
3026  template <typename... Args>
3027  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3028  packet_id_t packet_id,
3029  as::const_buffer topic_name,
3030  Args&&... args) {
3031  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
3032  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
3033  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3034  }
3035 
3049  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3050  packet_id_t packet_id,
3051  std::vector<mqtt::string_view> params,
3052  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3053  ) {
3054  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
3055  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
3056 
3057  for (auto&& e : params) {
3058  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(e.data(), e.size()));
3059  }
3060  send_unsubscribe(std::move(cb_params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3061  }
3062 
3076  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3077  packet_id_t packet_id,
3078  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
3079  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3080  ) {
3081  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3082  }

3149  void connect(
3150  std::string const& client_id,
3151  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
3152  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
3153  mqtt::optional<will> const& w,
3154  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
3155  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3156  ) {
3157  connect_requested_ = true;
3158  send_connect(client_id, user_name, password, w, keep_alive_sec, std::move(props));
3159  }

3364  void async_publish_at_most_once(

3366  std::string contents,
3367  bool retain = false,
3368  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3369  ) {
3370  acquired_async_publish(0, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos::at_most_once, retain, std::move(func));
3371  }

3396  ) {

3468  packet_id_t async_publish_at_least_once(
3469  std::string topic_name,
3470  std::string contents,
3471  bool retain = false,
3472  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3473  ) {
3474  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3475  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(func));
3476  return packet_id;
3477  }

3710  packet_id_t async_publish(
3711  std::string topic_name,
3712  std::string contents,
3713  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
3714  bool retain = false,
3715  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3716  ) {
3717  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
3718  packet_id_t packet_id = qos == qos::at_most_once ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
3719  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(func));
3720  return packet_id;
3721  }

3745  std::string topic_name,

3747  std::uint8_t qos,

3750  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3751  ) {
3752  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
3753  packet_id_t packet_id = qos == qos::at_most_once ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
3754  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
3755  return packet_id;
3756  }

3849  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
3850  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
3851  std::string topic_name,
3852  std::uint8_t option,
3853  Arg0&& arg0,
3854  Args&&... args) {
3855  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3856  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3857  return packet_id;
3858  }

3881  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
3882  as::const_buffer topic_name,
3883  std::uint8_t option,
3884  Arg0&& arg0,
3885  Args&&... args) {
3886  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3887  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3888  return packet_id;
3889  }

4001 
4015  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
4016  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> const& params,
4017  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4018  ) {
4019  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4020  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(func));
4021  return packet_id;
4022  }
4023

4043  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,

4045  ) {
4046  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4047  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4048  return packet_id;
4049  }

4116  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
4117  packet_id_t async_unsubscribe(
4118  std::string topic_name,
4119  Arg0&& arg0,
4120  Args&&... args) {
4121  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4122  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4123  return packet_id;
4124  }
4125 
4142  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
4143  packet_id_t async_unsubscribe(
4144  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4145  Arg0&& arg0,
4146  Args&&... args) {
4147  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4148  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4149  return packet_id;
4150  }

4168  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(func));

4331 
4340  void async_disconnect(
4341  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4342  ) {
4343  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
4344  disconnect_requested_ = true;
4345  async_send_disconnect(std::move(func));
4346  }
4347  }
4348 
4365  void async_disconnect(
4366  std::uint8_t reason,
4367  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4368  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4369  ) {
4370  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
4371  disconnect_requested_ = true;
4372  async_send_disconnect(reason, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4373  }
4374  }
4375 
4376  // packet_id manual setting version
4377 
4395  bool async_publish_at_least_once(
4396  packet_id_t packet_id,
4397  std::string topic_name,
4398  std::string contents,
4399  bool retain = false,
4400  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4401  ) {
4402  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4403  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(func));
4404  return true;
4405  }
4406  return false;
4407  }
4408 
4430  bool async_publish_at_least_once(
4431  packet_id_t packet_id,
4432  std::string topic_name,
4433  std::string contents,
4434  bool retain,
4435  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4436  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4437  ) {
4438  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4439  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4440  return true;
4441  }
4442  return false;
4443  }
4444 
4464  bool async_publish_at_least_once(
4465  packet_id_t packet_id,
4466  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4467  as::const_buffer contents,
4468  mqtt::any life_keeper,
4469  bool retain = false,
4470  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4471  ) {
4472  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4473  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(func));
4474  return true;
4475  }
4476  return false;
4477  }

4510  ) {

4512  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4513  return true;
4514  }

4604  bool async_publish_exactly_once(
4605  packet_id_t packet_id,
4606  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4607  as::const_buffer contents,
4608  mqtt::any life_keeper,
4609  bool retain = false,
4610  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4611  ) {

4618 
4642  bool async_publish_exactly_once(
4643  packet_id_t packet_id,
4644  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4645  as::const_buffer contents,
4646  mqtt::any life_keeper,
4647  bool retain,
4648  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4649  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4650  ) {
4651  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4652  acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4653  return true;
4654  }
4655  return false;
4656  }
4657 
4677  bool async_publish(
4678  packet_id_t packet_id,
4679  std::string topic_name,
4680  std::string contents,
4681  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
4682  bool retain = false,
4683  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4684  ) {
4685  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
4686  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4687  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(func));
4688  return true;
4689  }
4690  return false;
4691  }
4692 
4716  bool async_publish(
4717  packet_id_t packet_id,
4718  std::string topic_name,
4719  std::string contents,
4720  std::uint8_t qos,
4721  bool retain,
4722  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4723  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4724  ) {
4725  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
4726  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4727  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4728  return true;
4729  }
4730  return false;
4731  }

4951  packet_id_t packet_id,
4952  as::const_buffer topic_name,

4955  std::uint8_t qos,
4956  bool retain,

4959  ) {

4963  return true;
4964  }

4990  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
4991  bool async_subscribe(
4992  packet_id_t packet_id,
4993  std::string topic_name,
4994  std::uint8_t option,
4995  Arg0&& arg0,
4996  Args&&... args) {
4997  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4998  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4999  return true;
5000  }
5001  return false;
5002  }

5035  return true;
5036  }

5400 
5414  bool async_unsubscribe(
5415  packet_id_t packet_id,
5416  std::vector<as::const_buffer> const& params,
5417  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5418  ) {
5419  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5420  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(func));
5421  return true;
5422  }
5423  return false;
5424  }
5425 
5443  bool async_unsubscribe(
5444  packet_id_t packet_id,
5445  std::vector<as::const_buffer> const& params,
5446  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5447  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5448  ) {
5449  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5450  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(props), std::move(func));
5451  return true;
5452  }
5453  return false;
5454  }
5455 
5456  // packet_id has already been acquired version
5457 
5474  void acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(
5475  packet_id_t packet_id,
5476  std::string topic_name,
5477  std::string contents,
5478  bool retain = false,
5479  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5480  ) {
5481 
5482  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5483  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5484 
5485  async_send_publish(
5486  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5487  qos::at_least_once,
5488  retain,
5489  false,
5490  packet_id,
5491  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5492  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5493  std::move(func),
5494  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5495  );
5496  }
5497 
5518  void acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(
5519  packet_id_t packet_id,
5520  std::string topic_name,
5521  std::string contents,
5522  bool retain,
5523  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5524  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5525  ) {
5526 
5527  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5528  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5529 
5530  async_send_publish(
5531  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5532  qos::at_least_once,
5533  retain,
5534  false,
5535  packet_id,
5536  std::move(props),
5537  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5538  std::move(func),
5539  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5540  );
5541  }
5542

5562  packet_id_t packet_id,
5563  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5564  as::const_buffer contents,
5565  mqtt::any life_keeper,
5566  bool retain = false,
5567  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5568  ) {
5569 
5570  async_send_publish(
5571  topic_name,
5572  qos::at_least_once,
5573  retain,
5574  false,
5575  packet_id,
5576  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5577  contents,
5578  std::move(func),
5579  std::move(life_keeper)
5580  );
5581  }

5605  void acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(
5606  packet_id_t packet_id,
5607  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5608  as::const_buffer contents,
5609  mqtt::any life_keeper,
5610  bool retain,
5611  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5612  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5613  ) {
5614 
5615  async_send_publish(
5616  topic_name,
5617  qos::at_least_once,
5618  retain,
5619  false,
5620  packet_id,
5621  std::move(props),
5622  contents,
5623  std::move(func),
5624  std::move(life_keeper)
5625  );
5626  }

5644  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5645  packet_id_t packet_id,
5646  std::string topic_name,
5647  std::string contents,
5648  bool retain = false,
5649  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5650  ) {
5651 
5652  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5653  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5654 
5655  async_send_publish(
5656  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5657  qos::exactly_once,
5658  retain,
5659  false,
5660  packet_id,
5661  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5662  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5663  std::move(func),
5664  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5665  );
5666  }
5667 
5688  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5689  packet_id_t packet_id,
5690  std::string topic_name,
5691  std::string contents,
5692  bool retain,
5693  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5694  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5695  ) {
5696 
5697  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5698  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5699 
5700  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5701  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5702 
5703  async_send_publish(
5704  topic_buf,
5705  qos::at_least_once,
5706  retain,
5707  false,
5708  std::move(props),
5709  packet_id,
5710  contents_buf,
5711  std::move(func),
5712  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5713  );
5714  }
5715 
5734  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5735  packet_id_t packet_id,
5736  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5737  as::const_buffer contents,
5738  mqtt::any life_keeper,
5739  bool retain = false,
5740  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5741  ) {

5743  async_send_publish(
5744  topic_name,

5746  retain,

5748  packet_id,

5750  contents,
5751  std::move(func),
5752  std::move(life_keeper)
5753  );
5754  }
5755 
5778  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5779  packet_id_t packet_id,
5780  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5781  as::const_buffer contents,
5782  mqtt::any life_keeper,
5783  bool retain,
5784  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5785  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5786  ) {
5787 
5788  async_send_publish(
5789  topic_name,
5790  qos::exactly_once,
5791  retain,
5792  false,
5793  packet_id,
5794  std::move(props),
5795  contents,
5796  std::move(func),
5797  std::move(life_keeper)
5798  );
5799  }
5800 
5820  void acquired_async_publish(
5821  packet_id_t packet_id,
5822  std::string topic_name,
5823  std::string contents,
5824  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
5825  bool retain = false,
5826  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5827  ) {
5828  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
5829  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
5830 
5831  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(topic_name);
5832  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(contents);
5833 
5834  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5835  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5836 
5837  async_send_publish(
5838  topic_buf,
5839  qos,
5840  retain,
5841  false,
5842  packet_id,
5843  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5844  contents_buf,
5845  std::move(func),
5846  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5847  );
5848  }
5849 
5873  void acquired_async_publish(
5874  packet_id_t packet_id,
5875  std::string topic_name,
5876  std::string contents,
5877  std::uint8_t qos,
5878  bool retain,
5879  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5880  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5881  ) {
5882  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
5883  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
5884 
5885  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5886  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5887 
5888  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5889  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5890 
5891  async_send_publish(
5892  topic_buf,
5893  qos,
5894  retain,
5895  false,
5896  packet_id,
5897  std::move(props),
5898  contents_buf,
5899  std::move(func),
5900  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5901  );
5902  }

6000 
6020  void acquired_async_publish_dup(
6021  packet_id_t packet_id,
6022  std::string topic_name,
6023  std::string contents,
6024  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
6025  bool retain = false,
6026  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6027  ) {
6028  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
6029  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
6030 
6031  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(topic_name);
6032  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(contents);
6033 
6034  async_send_publish(
6035  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
6036  qos,
6037  retain,
6038  true,
6039  packet_id,
6040  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
6041  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
6042  std::move(func),
6043  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
6044  );
6045  }
6046 
6070  void acquired_async_publish_dup(
6071  packet_id_t packet_id,
6072  std::string topic_name,
6073  std::string contents,
6074  std::uint8_t qos,
6075  bool retain,
6076  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6077  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6078  ) {
6079  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
6080  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
6081 
6082  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
6083  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
6084 
6085  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
6086  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
6087 
6088  async_send_publish(
6089  topic_buf,
6090  qos,
6091  retain,
6092  true,
6093  packet_id,
6094  std::move(props),
6095  contents_buf,
6096  std::move(func),
6097  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
6098  );
6099  }

6180  ) {

6196 
6217  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6218  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6219  packet_id_t packet_id,
6220  std::string topic_name,
6221  std::uint8_t option,
6222  Arg0&& arg0,
6223  Args&&... args) {
6224  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6225  }
6226 
6247  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6248  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6249  packet_id_t packet_id,
6250  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6251  std::uint8_t option,
6252  Arg0&& arg0,
6253  Args&&... args) {
6254  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6255  }
6256 
6277  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6278  packet_id_t packet_id,
6279  std::string topic_name,
6280  std::uint8_t option,
6281  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6282  ) {
6283  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
6284  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
6285 
6286  async_send_subscribe(
6287  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_buf, option)}),
6288  std::move(sp_topic_name),
6289  packet_id,
6290  std::move(func)
6291  );
6292  }
6293 
6314  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6315  packet_id_t packet_id,
6316  std::string topic_name,
6317  std::uint8_t option,
6318  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6319  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6320  ) {
6321  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
6322  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
6323 
6324  async_send_subscribe(
6325  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_buf, option)}),
6326  std::move(sp_topic_name),
6327  packet_id,
6328  std::move(props),
6329  std::move(func)
6330  );
6331  }
6332 
6349  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6350  packet_id_t packet_id,
6351  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6352  std::uint8_t option,
6353  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6354  ) {
6355  async_send_subscribe(
6356  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_name, option)}),
6357  mqtt::any(),
6358  packet_id,
6359  std::move(func)
6360  );
6361  }
6362 
6383  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6384  packet_id_t packet_id,
6385  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6386  std::uint8_t option,
6387  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6388  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6389  ) {
6390 
6391  async_send_subscribe(
6392  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_name, option)}),
6393  mqtt::any(),
6394  packet_id,
6395  std::move(props),
6396  std::move(func)
6397  );
6398  }
6399 
6414  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6415  packet_id_t packet_id,
6416  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> params,
6417  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6418  ) {
6419 
6420  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
6421  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6422 
6423  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6424  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6425 
6426  for (auto&& e : params) {
6427  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(std::get<0>(e)));
6428  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic_name), std::get<1>(e));
6429  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::move(sp_topic_name));
6430  }
6431  async_send_subscribe(
6432  std::move(cb_params),
6433  std::move(life_keepers),
6434  packet_id,
6435  std::move(func)
6436  );
6437  }
6438 
6457  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6458  packet_id_t packet_id,
6459  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> params,
6460  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6461  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6462  ) {
6463 
6464  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
6465  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6466 
6467  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6468  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6469 
6470  for (auto&& e : params) {
6471  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(std::get<0>(e)));
6472  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic_name), std::get<1>(e));
6473  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::move(sp_topic_name));
6474  }
6475  async_send_subscribe(
6476  std::move(cb_params),
6477  life_keepers,
6478  packet_id,
6479  std::move(props),
6480  std::move(func)
6481  );
6482  }
6483 
6495  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6496  packet_id_t packet_id,
6497  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
6498  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6499  ) {
6500  async_send_subscribe(
6501  std::move(params),
6502  mqtt::any(),
6503  packet_id,
6504  std::move(func)
6505  );
6506  }
6507 
6522  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6523  packet_id_t packet_id,
6524  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
6525  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6526  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6527  ) {
6528  async_send_subscribe(
6529  std::move(params),
6530  mqtt::any(),
6531  packet_id,
6532  std::move(props),
6533  std::move(func)
6534  );
6535  }
6536 
6553  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6554  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6555  packet_id_t packet_id,
6556  std::string topic_name,
6557  Arg0&& arg0,
6558  Args&&... args) {
6559  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6560  }
6561 
6578  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6579  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6580  packet_id_t packet_id,
6581  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6582  Arg0&& arg0,
6583  Args&&... args) {
6584  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6585  }
6586 
6599  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6600  packet_id_t packet_id,
6601  std::vector<std::string> params,
6602  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6603  ) {
6604 
6605  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
6606  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6607 
6608  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6609  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6610 
6611  for (auto&& e : params) {
6612  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(e)));
6613  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*life_keepers.back()));
6614  }
6615 
6616  async_send_unsubscribe(
6617  std::move(cb_params),
6618  std::move(life_keepers),
6619  packet_id,
6620  std::move(func)
6621  );
6622  }
6623 
6640  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6641  packet_id_t packet_id,
6642  std::vector<std::string> params,
6643  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6644  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6645  ) {
6646 
6647  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
6648  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6649 
6650  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6651  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6652 
6653  for (auto&& e : params) {
6654  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(e)));
6655  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*life_keepers.back()));
6656  }
6657 
6658  async_send_unsubscribe(
6659  std::move(cb_params),
6660  life_keepers,
6661  packet_id,
6662  std::move(props),
6663  std::move(func)
6664  );
6665  }
6666 
6679  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6680  packet_id_t packet_id,
6681  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
6682  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6683  ) {
6684 
6685  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6686  async_send_unsubscribe(
6687  std::move(params),
6688  life_keepers,
6689  packet_id,
6690  std::move(func)
6691  );
6692  }
6693 
6710  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6711  packet_id_t packet_id,
6712  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
6713  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6714  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6715  ) {
6716 
6717  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6718  async_send_unsubscribe(
6719  std::move(params),
6720  life_keepers,
6721  packet_id,
6722  std::move(props),
6723  std::move(func)
6724  );
6725  }

6735  }

6790  void async_connect(
6791  std::string const& client_id,
6792  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
6793  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
6794  mqtt::optional<will> const& w,
6795  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
6796  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6797  ) {
6798  async_connect(client_id,
6799  user_name,
6800  password,
6801  w,
6802  keep_alive_sec,
6803  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
6804  std::move(func));
6805  }
6806 
6834  void async_connect(
6835  std::string const& client_id,
6836  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
6837  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
6838  mqtt::optional<will> const& w,
6839  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
6840  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6841  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6842  ) {
6843  connect_requested_ = true;
6844  async_send_connect(client_id,
6845  user_name,
6846  password,
6847  w,
6848  keep_alive_sec,
6849  std::move(props),
6850  std::move(func));
6851  }

7056  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
7057  void async_suback(
7058  packet_id_t packet_id,
7059  std::uint8_t reason,
7060  Arg0&& arg0,
7061  Args&&... args) {
7062  async_suback_imp(packet_id, reason, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7063  }

7274 
7279  void clear_stored_publish(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7280  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7281  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id>();
7282  auto r = idx.equal_range(packet_id);
7283  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
7284  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
7285  }
7286 
7291  std::unique_ptr<Socket>& socket() {
7292  return socket_;
7293  }
7294 
7299  std::unique_ptr<Socket> const& socket() const {
7300  return socket_;
7301  }
7302 
7303 
7308  void for_each_store(std::function<void(char const*, std::size_t)> const& f) {
7309  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7310  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
7311  for (auto const & e : idx) {
7312  auto const& m = e.message();
7313  auto cb = continuous_buffer(m);
7314  f(cb.data(), cb.size());
7315  }
7316  }
7317 
7322  void for_each_store(std::function<void(message_variant const&)> const& f) {
7323  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7324  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
7325  for (auto const & e : idx) {
7326  f(e.message());
7327  }
7328  }
7329 
7330  // manual packet_id management for advanced users
7331 
7340  packet_id_t acquire_unique_packet_id() {
7341  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7342  if (packet_id_.size() == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) throw packet_id_exhausted_error();
7343  if (packet_id_master_ == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
7344  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
7345  }
7346  else {
7347  ++packet_id_master_;
7348  }
7349  auto ret = packet_id_.insert(packet_id_master_);
7350  if (ret.second) return packet_id_master_;
7351 
7352  auto last = packet_id_.end();
7353  auto e = last;
7354  --last;
7355 
7356  if (*last != std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
7357  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(*last + 1U);
7358  packet_id_.insert(e, packet_id_master_);
7359  return packet_id_master_;
7360  }
7361 
7362  auto b = packet_id_.begin();
7363  auto prev = *b;
7364  if (prev != 1U) {
7365  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
7366  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
7367  return packet_id_master_;
7368  }
7369  ++b;
7370  while (*b - 1U == prev && b != e) {
7371  prev = *b;
7372  ++b;
7373  }
7374  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(prev + 1U);
7375  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
7376  return packet_id_master_;
7377  }
7378 
7386  bool register_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7387  if (packet_id == 0) return false;
7388  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7389  return packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second;
7390  }
7391 
7399  bool release_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7400  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7401  return packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
7402  }
7403 
7411  template <typename Iterator>
7412  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
7413  restore_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
7414  if (b == e) return;
7415 
7416  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
7417  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
7418  case control_packet_type::publish: {
7419  auto sp = std::make_shared<std::string>(b, e);
7420  restore_serialized_message(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(sp->begin(), sp->end()), sp);
7421  } break;
7422  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
7423  restore_serialized_message(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(b, e));
7424  } break;
7425  default:
7426  throw protocol_error();
7427  break;
7428  }
7429  }
7430 
7438  void restore_serialized_message(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, mqtt::any life_keeper) {
7439  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7440  auto qos = msg.qos();
7441  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7442  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7443  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7444  packet_id,
7445  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7446  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7447  std::move(msg),
7448  std::move(life_keeper)
7449  );
7450  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7451  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7452  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7453  if (!ret.second) {
7454  store_.modify(
7455  ret.first,
7456  [&] (auto& e) {
7457  e = store(
7458  packet_id,
7459  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7460  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7461  std::move(msg),
7462  std::move(life_keeper)
7463  );
7464  }
7465  );
7466  }
7467  }
7468  }
7469 
7475  void restore_serialized_message(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
7476  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7477  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7478  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7479  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7480  packet_id,
7481  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7482  std::move(msg)
7483  );
7484  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7485  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7486  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7487  if (!ret.second) {
7488  store_.modify(
7489  ret.first,
7490  [&] (auto& e) {
7491  e = store(
7492  packet_id,
7493  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7494  std::move(msg)
7495  );
7496  }
7497  );
7498  }
7499  }
7500  }
7501 
7509  template <typename Iterator>
7510  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
7511  restore_v5_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
7512  if (b == e) return;
7513 
7514  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
7515  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
7516  case control_packet_type::publish: {
7517  auto sp = std::make_shared<std::string>(b, e);
7518  restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(sp->begin(), sp->end()), sp);
7519  } break;
7520  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
7521  auto sp = std::make_shared<std::string>(b, e);
7522  restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(sp->begin(), sp->end()), sp);
7523  } break;
7524  default:
7525  throw protocol_error();
7526  break;
7527  }
7528  }
7529 
7537  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, mqtt::any life_keeper) {
7538  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7539  auto qos = msg.qos();
7540  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7541  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7542  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7543  packet_id,
7544  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7545  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7546  std::move(msg),
7547  std::move(life_keeper)
7548  );
7549  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7550  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7551  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7552  if (!ret.second) {
7553  store_.modify(
7554  ret.first,
7555  [&] (auto& e) {
7556  e = store(
7557  packet_id,
7558  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7559  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7560  std::move(msg),
7561  std::move(life_keeper)
7562  );
7563  }
7564  );
7565  }
7566  }
7567  }
7568 
7576  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, mqtt::any life_keeper) {
7577  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7578  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7579  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7580  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7581  packet_id,
7582  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7583  std::move(msg),
7584  std::move(life_keeper)
7585  );
7586  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7587  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7588  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7589  if (!ret.second) {
7590  store_.modify(
7591  ret.first,
7592  [&] (auto& e) {
7593  e = store(
7594  packet_id,
7595  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7596  std::move(msg)
7597  );
7598  }
7599  );
7600  }
7601  }
7602  }
7603 
7608  bool connected() const {
7609  return connected_ && mqtt_connected_;
7610  }
7611 
7624  void set_mqtt_message_processed_handler(
7625  mqtt_message_processed_handler const& h = mqtt_message_processed_handler()) {
7626  if (h) {
7627  h_mqtt_message_processed_ = h;
7628  }
7629  else {
7630  h_mqtt_message_processed_ =
7631  [this]
7632  (async_handler_t func) {
7633  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
7634  };
7635  }
7636  }
7637 
7643  void async_read_next_message(async_handler_t func) {
7644  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
7645  }
7646 
7659  void set_max_queue_send_count(std::size_t count) {
7660  max_queue_send_count_ = count;
7661  }
7662 
7675  void set_max_queue_send_size(std::size_t size) {
7676  max_queue_send_size_ = size;
7677  }
7678 
7679  protocol_version get_protocol_version() const {
7680  return version_;
7681  }
7682 
7683 protected:
7684  void async_read_control_packet_type(async_handler_t func) {
7685  async_read(
7686  *socket_,
7687  as::buffer(&buf_, 1),
7688  [self = this->shared_from_this(), func = std::move(func)](
7689  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7690  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
7691  if (self->handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
7692  if (func) func(ec);
7693  return;
7694  }
7695  if (bytes_transferred != 1) {
7696  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
7697  return;
7698  }
7699  self->handle_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
7700  }
7701  );
7702  }
7703 
7704  bool handle_close_or_error(boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
7705  if (!ec) return false;
7706  if (connected_) {
7707  connected_ = false;
7708  mqtt_connected_ = false;
7709  shutdown_from_server(*socket_);
7710  }
7711  if (ec == as::error::eof ||
7712  ec == as::error::connection_reset
7713 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7714  ||
7715  ec == boost::beast::websocket::error::closed
7716 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7717 #if !defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7718  ||
7719 #if defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7720  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == SSL_R_SHORT_READ
7721 #else // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7722  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == boost::asio::ssl::error::stream_truncated
7723 #endif // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7724 #endif // defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7725  ) {
7726  if (disconnect_requested_) {
7727  disconnect_requested_ = false;
7728  connect_requested_ = false;
7729  handle_close();
7730  return true;
7731  }
7732  }
7733  disconnect_requested_ = false;
7734  connect_requested_ = false;
7735  handle_error(ec);
7736  return true;
7737  }
7738 
7739  void set_connect() {
7740  connected_ = true;
7741  }
7742 
7743  void set_protocol_version(std::size_t version) {
7744  version_ = version;
7745  }
7746 
7747  void handle_close() {
7748  if (h_close_) h_close_();
7749  }
7750 
7751  void handle_error(boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
7752  if (h_error_) h_error_(ec);
7753  }
7754 
7755 private:
7756  template <typename T>
7757  void shutdown_from_client(T& socket) {
7758  boost::system::error_code ec;
7759  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
7760  }
7761 
7762  template <typename T>
7763  void shutdown_from_server(T& socket) {
7764  boost::system::error_code ec;
7765  socket.close(ec);
7766  }
7767 
7768 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7769  template <typename T, typename S>
7770  void shutdown_from_server(ws_endpoint<T, S>& /*socket*/) {
7771  }
7772 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7773 
7774 #if !defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7775  template <typename T>
7776  void shutdown_from_client(as::ssl::stream<T>& socket) {
7777  boost::system::error_code ec;
7778  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
7779  }
7780  template <typename T>
7781  void shutdown_from_server(as::ssl::stream<T>& socket) {
7782  boost::system::error_code ec;
7783  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
7784  }
7785 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7786  template <typename T, typename S>
7787  void shutdown_from_client(ws_endpoint<as::ssl::stream<T>, S>& socket) {
7788  boost::system::error_code ec;
7789  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
7790  }
7791  template <typename T, typename S>
7792  void shutdown_from_server(ws_endpoint<as::ssl::stream<T>, S>& /*socket*/) {
7793  }
7794 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7795 #endif // defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7796 
7797 
7798  template <typename... Args>
7799  typename std::enable_if<
7800  std::is_convertible<
7801  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7802  async_handler_t
7803  >::value
7804  >::type
7805  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7806  packet_id_t packet_id,
7807  std::string topic_name,
7808  std::uint8_t qos,
7809  Args&&... args) {
7810 
7811  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7812  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7813 
7814  async_send_subscribe(
7815  std::move(params),
7816  mqtt::any(),
7817  packet_id,
7818  std::move(topic_name),
7819  qos,
7820  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7821  );
7822  }
7823 
7824  template <typename... Args>
7825  typename std::enable_if<
7826  std::is_convertible<
7827  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7828  async_handler_t
7829  >::value
7830  >::type
7831  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7832  packet_id_t packet_id,
7833  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7834  std::uint8_t qos,
7835  Args&&... args) {
7836 
7837  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7838  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7839 
7840  async_send_subscribe(
7841  std::move(params),
7842  mqtt::any(),
7843  packet_id,
7844  topic_name,
7845  qos,
7846  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7847  );
7848  }
7849 
7850  template <typename... Args>
7851  typename std::enable_if<
7852  !std::is_convertible<
7853  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7854  async_handler_t
7855  >::value
7856  >::type
7857  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7858  packet_id_t packet_id,
7859  std::string topic_name,
7860  std::uint8_t qos,
7861  Args&&... args) {
7862 
7863  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7864  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7865 
7866  async_send_subscribe(
7867  std::move(params),
7868  mqtt::any(),
7869  packet_id,
7870  std::move(topic_name),
7871  qos,
7872  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7873  async_handler_t()
7874  );
7875  }
7876 
7877  template <typename... Args>
7878  typename std::enable_if<
7879  !std::is_convertible<
7880  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7881  async_handler_t
7882  >::value
7883  >::type
7884  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7885  packet_id_t packet_id,
7886  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7887  std::uint8_t qos,
7888  Args&&... args) {
7889 
7890  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7891  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7892 
7893  async_send_subscribe(
7894  std::move(params),
7895  mqtt::any(),
7896  packet_id,
7897  topic_name,
7898  qos,
7899  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7900  async_handler_t()
7901  );
7902  }
7903 
7904  template <typename... Args>
7905  typename std::enable_if<
7906  std::is_convertible<
7907  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7908  async_handler_t
7909  >::value
7910  >::type
7911  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7912  packet_id_t packet_id,
7913  std::string topic_name,
7914  Args&&... args) {
7915 
7916  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
7917  params.reserve(sizeof...(args));
7918 
7919  async_send_unsubscribe(
7920  std::move(params),
7921  mqtt::any(),
7922  packet_id,
7923  std::move(topic_name),
7924  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7925  );
7926  }
7927 
7928  template <typename... Args>
7929  typename std::enable_if<
7930  std::is_convertible<
7931  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7932  async_handler_t
7933  >::value
7934  >::type
7935  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7936  packet_id_t packet_id,
7937  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7938  Args&&... args) {
7939 
7940  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
7941  params.reserve(sizeof...(args));
7942 
7943  async_send_unsubscribe(
7944  std::move(params),
7945  mqtt::any(),
7946  packet_id,
7947  topic_name,
7948  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7949  );
7950  }
7951 
7952  template <typename... Args>
7953  typename std::enable_if<
7954  !std::is_convertible<
7955  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7956  async_handler_t
7957  >::value
7958  >::type
7959  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7960  packet_id_t packet_id,
7961  std::string topic_name,
7962  Args&&... args) {
7963 
7964  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
7965  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
7966 
7967  async_send_unsubscribe(
7968  std::move(params),
7969  mqtt::any(),
7970  packet_id,
7971  std::move(topic_name),
7972  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7973  async_handler_t()
7974  );
7975  }
7976 
7977  template <typename... Args>
7978  typename std::enable_if<
7979  !std::is_convertible<
7980  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7981  async_handler_t
7982  >::value
7983  >::type
7984  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7985  packet_id_t packet_id,
7986  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7987  Args&&... args) {
7988 
7989  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
7990  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
7991 
7992  async_send_unsubscribe(
7993  std::move(params),
7994  mqtt::any(),
7995  packet_id,
7996  topic_name,
7997  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7998  async_handler_t()
7999  );
8000  }
8001 
8002  template <typename... Args>
8003  typename std::enable_if<
8004  std::is_convertible<
8005  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8006  async_handler_t
8007  >::value
8008  >::type
8009  async_suback_imp(
8010  packet_id_t packet_id,
8011  std::uint8_t qos,
8012  Args&&... args) {
8013  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>(), packet_id, qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
8014  }
8015 
8016  template <typename... Args>
8017  typename std::enable_if<
8018  !std::is_convertible<
8019  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8020  async_handler_t
8021  >::value
8022  >::type
8023  async_suback_imp(
8024  packet_id_t packet_id,
8025  Args&&... qos) {
8026  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>({qos...}), packet_id, async_handler_t());
8027  }
8028 
8029  template <typename... Args>
8030  typename std::enable_if<
8031  std::is_convertible<
8032  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8033  async_handler_t
8034  >::value
8035  >::type
8036  async_unsuback_imp(
8037  packet_id_t packet_id,
8038  std::uint8_t qos,
8039  Args&&... args) {
8040  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>(), packet_id, qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
8041  }
8042 
8043  template <typename... Args>
8044  typename std::enable_if<
8045  !std::is_convertible<
8046  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8047  async_handler_t
8048  >::value
8049  >::type
8050  async_unsuback_imp(
8051  packet_id_t packet_id,
8052  Args&&... qos) {
8053  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>({qos...}), packet_id, async_handler_t());
8054  }
8055 
8056  class send_buffer {
8057  public:
8058  send_buffer():buf_(std::make_shared<std::string>(static_cast<int>(payload_position_), 0)) {}
8059 
8060  std::shared_ptr<std::string> const& buf() const {
8061  return buf_;
8062  }
8063 
8064  std::shared_ptr<std::string>& buf() {
8065  return buf_;
8066  }
8067 
8068  std::pair<char*, std::size_t> finalize(std::uint8_t fixed_header) {
8069  auto rb = remaining_bytes(buf_->size() - payload_position_);
8070  std::size_t start_position = payload_position_ - rb.size() - 1;
