8071  (*buf_)[start_position] = fixed_header;
8072  buf_->replace(start_position + 1, rb.size(), rb);
8073  return std::make_pair(
8074  &(*buf_)[start_position],
8075  buf_->size() - start_position);
8076  }
8077  private:
8078  static constexpr std::size_t const payload_position_ = 5;
8079  std::shared_ptr<std::string> buf_;
8080  };
8081 
8082  struct store {
8083  store(
8084  packet_id_t id,
8085  std::uint8_t type,
8086  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv,
8087  mqtt::any life_keeper = mqtt::any())
8088  : packet_id_(id)
8089  , expected_control_packet_type_(type)
8090  , smv_(std::move(smv))
8091  , life_keeper_(std::move(life_keeper)) {}
8092  packet_id_t packet_id() const { return packet_id_; }
8093  std::uint8_t expected_control_packet_type() const { return expected_control_packet_type_; }
8094  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> message() const {
8095  return get_basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>(smv_);
8096  }
8097  private:
8098  packet_id_t packet_id_;
8099  std::uint8_t expected_control_packet_type_;
8100  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv_;
8101  mqtt::any life_keeper_;
8102  };
8103 
8104  struct tag_packet_id {};
8105  struct tag_packet_id_type {};
8106  struct tag_seq {};
8107  using mi_store = mi::multi_index_container<
8108  store,
8109  mi::indexed_by<
8110  mi::ordered_unique<
8111  mi::tag<tag_packet_id_type>,
8112  mi::composite_key<
8113  store,
8114  mi::const_mem_fun<
8115  store, packet_id_t,
8116  &store::packet_id
8117  >,
8118  mi::const_mem_fun<
8119  store, std::uint8_t,
8120  &store::expected_control_packet_type
8121  >
8122  >
8123  >,
8124  mi::ordered_non_unique<
8125  mi::tag<tag_packet_id>,
8126  mi::const_mem_fun<
8127  store, packet_id_t,
8128  &store::packet_id
8129  >
8130  >,
8131  mi::sequenced<
8132  mi::tag<tag_seq>
8133  >
8134  >
8135  >;
8136 
8137  void handle_control_packet_type(async_handler_t func) {
8138  fixed_header_ = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(buf_);
8139  remaining_length_ = 0;
8140  remaining_length_multiplier_ = 1;
8141  async_read(
8142  *socket_,
8143  as::buffer(&buf_, 1),
8144  [self = this->shared_from_this(), func = std::move(func)](
8145  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8146  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
8147  if (self->handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
8148  if (func) func(ec);
8149  return;
8150  }
8151  if (bytes_transferred != 1) {
8152  self->handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8153  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8154  return;
8155  }
8156  self->handle_remaining_length(std::move(func));
8157  }
8158  );
8159  }
8160 
8161  void handle_remaining_length(async_handler_t func) {
8162  remaining_length_ += (buf_ & 0b01111111) * remaining_length_multiplier_;
8163  remaining_length_multiplier_ *= 128;
8164  if (remaining_length_multiplier_ > 128 * 128 * 128 * 128) {
8165  handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8166  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8167  return;
8168  }
8169  if (buf_ & 0b10000000) {
8170  async_read(
8171  *socket_,
8172  as::buffer(&buf_, 1),
8173  [self = this->shared_from_this(), func = std::move(func)](
8174  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8175  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
8176  if (self->handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
8177  if (func) func(ec);
8178  return;
8179  }
8180  if (bytes_transferred != 1) {
8181  self->handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8182  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8183  return;
8184  }
8185  self->handle_remaining_length(std::move(func));
8186  }
8187  );
8188  }
8189  else {
8190  auto check =
8191  [&]() -> bool {
8192  auto cpt = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
8193  switch (version_) {
8194  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8195  switch (cpt) {
8196  case control_packet_type::connect:
8197  case control_packet_type::publish:
8198  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8199  case control_packet_type::suback:
8200  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8201  if (h_is_valid_length_) {
8202  return h_is_valid_length_(cpt, remaining_length_);
8203  }
8204  else {
8205  return true;
8206  }
8207  case control_packet_type::connack:
8208  return remaining_length_ == 2;
8209  case control_packet_type::puback:
8210  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8211  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8212  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8213  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8214  return remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t);
8215  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8216  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8217  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8218  return remaining_length_ == 0;
8219  default:
8220  return false;
8221  }
8222  break;
8223  case protocol_version::v5:
8224  default:
8225  switch (cpt) {
8226  case control_packet_type::connect:
8227  case control_packet_type::publish:
8228  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8229  case control_packet_type::suback:
8230  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8231  case control_packet_type::connack:
8232  case control_packet_type::puback:
8233  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8234  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8235  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8236  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8237  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8238  if (h_is_valid_length_) {
8239  return h_is_valid_length_(cpt, remaining_length_);
8240  }
8241  else {
8242  return true;
8243  }
8244  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8245  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8246  return remaining_length_ == 0;
8247  default:
8248  return false;
8249  }
8250  break;
8251  }
8252  };
8253  if (!check()) {
8254  handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8255  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8256  return;
8257  }
8258  /*
8259  * Note that this call to resize will never shrink the vector's allocated memory
8260  * The standard guarentees that iterators to items that are still valid with the
8261  * new size will remain valid. There are only two ways to provide that guarantee
8262  * - Ensure that unused memory is only freed with calls to the memory allocator
8263  * that will reclaim the unused memory, and not move items to a new buffer.
8264  * - Ensure that calls to resize only call the memory allocator when growing.
8265  * Testing by redboltz shows that the second possibility is the case for at least
8266  * one implementation of the standard library, and it's unlikely that there would
8267  * be a difference in this behavior between implementations.
8268  */
8269  payload_.resize(remaining_length_);
8270  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
8271  handle_payload(func);
8272  return;
8273  }
8274  async_read(
8275  *socket_,
8276  as::buffer(payload_),
8277  [self = this->shared_from_this(), func = std::move(func)](
8278  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8279  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
8280  auto g = unique_scope_guard(
8281  [&self]
8282  {
8283  self->payload_.clear();
8284  }
8285  );
8286  if (self->handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
8287  if (func) func(ec);
8288  return;
8289  }
8290  if (bytes_transferred != self->remaining_length_) {
8291  self->handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8292  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8293  return;
8294  }
8295  self->handle_payload(std::move(func));
8296  }
8297  );
8298  }
8299  }
8300 
8301  void handle_payload(async_handler_t func) {
8302  auto control_packet_type = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
8303  bool ret = false;
8304  switch (control_packet_type) {
8305  case control_packet_type::connect:
8306  ret = handle_connect(func);
8307  break;
8308  case control_packet_type::connack:
8309  ret = handle_connack(func);
8310  break;
8311  case control_packet_type::publish:
8312  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8313  ret = handle_publish(func);
8314  }
8315  break;
8316  case control_packet_type::puback:
8317  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8318  ret = handle_puback(func);
8319  }
8320  break;
8321  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8322  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8323  ret = handle_pubrec(func);
8324  }
8325  break;
8326  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8327  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8328  ret = handle_pubrel(func);
8329  }
8330  break;
8331  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8332  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8333  ret = handle_pubcomp(func);
8334  }
8335  break;
8336  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8337  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8338  ret = handle_subscribe(func);
8339  }
8340  break;
8341  case control_packet_type::suback:
8342  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8343  ret = handle_suback(func);
8344  }
8345  break;
8346  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8347  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8348  ret = handle_unsubscribe(func);
8349  }
8350  break;
8351  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8352  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8353  ret = handle_unsuback(func);
8354  }
8355  break;
8356  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8357  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8358  ret = handle_pingreq(func);
8359  }
8360  break;
8361  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8362  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8363  ret = handle_pingresp(func);
8364  }
8365  break;
8366  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8367  handle_disconnect(func);
8368  ret = false;
8369  break;
8370  case control_packet_type::auth:
8371  ret = handle_auth(func);
8372  break;
8373  default:
8374  break;
8375  }
8376  if (ret) {
8377  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
8378  }
8379  else if (func) {
8380  func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::success));
8381  }
8382  }
8383 
8384  bool handle_connect(async_handler_t const& func) {
8385  std::size_t i = 0;
8386  if (remaining_length_ < 10 || // *1
8387  payload_[i++] != 0x00 ||
8388  payload_[i++] != 0x04 ||
8389  payload_[i++] != 'M' ||
8390  payload_[i++] != 'Q' ||
8391  payload_[i++] != 'T' ||
8392  payload_[i++] != 'T') {
8393  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error));
8394  return false;
8395  }
8396 
8397  auto version = static_cast<protocol_version>(payload_[i++]);
8398  if (version != protocol_version::v3_1_1 && version != protocol_version::v5) {
8399  if (func) {
8400  func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_not_supported));
8401  }
8402  return false;
8403  }
8404 
8405  if (version_ == protocol_version::undetermined) {
8406  version_ = version;
8407  }
8408  else if (version_ != version) {
8409  if (func) {
8410  func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_not_supported));
8411  }
8412  return false;
8413  }
8414 
8415  const char byte8 = payload_[i++];
8416 
8417  const std::uint16_t keep_alive = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]); // index is checked at *1
8418  i += 2;
8419 
8420  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8421  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
8422  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
8423  char const* it = b;
8424  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
8425  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8426  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8427  }
8428  else {
8429  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8430  return false;
8431  }
8432  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
8433  }
8434 
8435  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
8436  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8437  return false;
8438  }
8439  const std::uint16_t client_id_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8440  i += 2;
8441 
8442  if (remaining_length_ < i + client_id_length) {
8443  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8444  return false;
8445  }
8446  std::string client_id(payload_.data() + i, client_id_length);
8447  if (utf8string::validate_contents(client_id) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
8448  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
8449  return false;
8450  }
8451  i += client_id_length;
8452 
8453  clean_session_ = connect_flags::has_clean_session(byte8);
8454  mqtt::optional<will> w;
8455  if (connect_flags::has_will_flag(byte8)) {
8456 
8457  std::vector<v5::property_variant> will_props;
8458  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
8459  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
8460  char const* it = b;
8461  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
8462  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8463  will_props = std::move(*props_opt);
8464  }
8465  else {
8466  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8467  return false;
8468  }
8469  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
8470  }
8471 
8472  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
8473  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8474  return false;
8475  }
8476  const std::uint16_t topic_name_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8477  i += 2;
8478 
8479  if (remaining_length_ < i + topic_name_length) {
8480  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8481  return false;
8482  }
8483  std::string topic_name(payload_.data() + i, topic_name_length);
8484  if (utf8string::validate_contents(topic_name) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
8485  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
8486  return false;
8487  }
8488 
8489  i += topic_name_length;
8490 
8491  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
8492  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8493  return false;
8494  }
8495  std::uint16_t will_message_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8496  i += 2;
8497 
8498  if (remaining_length_ < i + will_message_length) {
8499  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8500  return false;
8501  }
8502  std::string will_message(payload_.data() + i, will_message_length);
8503  i += will_message_length;
8504  w = will(topic_name,
8505  will_message,
8506  connect_flags::has_will_retain(byte8),
8507  connect_flags::will_qos(byte8),
8508  std::move(will_props));
8509  }
8510 
8511  mqtt::optional<std::string> user_name;
8512  if (connect_flags::has_user_name_flag(byte8)) {
8513 
8514  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
8515  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8516  return false;
8517  }
8518  const std::uint16_t user_name_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8519  i += 2;
8520 
8521  if (remaining_length_ < i + user_name_length) {
8522  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8523  return false;
8524  }
8525  user_name = std::string(payload_.data() + i, user_name_length);
8526  if (utf8string::validate_contents(user_name.value()) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
8527  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
8528  return false;
8529  }
8530  i += user_name_length;
8531  }
8532 
8533  mqtt::optional<std::string> password;
8534  if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(byte8)) {
8535 
8536  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
8537  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8538  return false;
8539  }
8540  const std::uint16_t password_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8541  i += 2;
8542 
8543  if (remaining_length_ < i + password_length) {
8544  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8545  return false;
8546  }
8547  password = std::string(payload_.data() + i, password_length);
8548  i += password_length;
8549  }
8550  mqtt_connected_ = true;
8551 
8552  if (clean_session_) {
8553  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
8554  store_.clear();
8555  packet_id_.clear();
8556  }
8557 
8558  switch (version_) {
8559  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8560  if (h_connect_) {
8561  if (h_connect_(
8562  client_id,
8563  user_name,
8564  password,
8565  std::move(w),
8566  clean_session_,
8567  keep_alive)
8568  ) {
8569  return true;
8570  }
8571  return false;
8572  }
8573  break;
8574  case protocol_version::v5:
8575  if (h_v5_connect_) {
8576  if (h_v5_connect_(
8577  client_id,
8578  user_name,
8579  password,
8580  std::move(w),
8581  clean_session_,
8582  keep_alive,
8583  props)
8584  ) {
8585  return true;
8586  }
8587  return false;
8588  }
8589  break;
8590  default:
8591  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8592  return false;
8593  }
8594  return true;
8595  }
8596 
8597  bool handle_connack(async_handler_t const& func) {
8598  if (!connect_requested_) {
8599  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error));
8600  return false;
8601  }
8602  connect_requested_ = false;
8603 
8604  if (remaining_length_ < 2) {
8605  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8606  return false;
8607  }
8608  if (static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[1]) == connect_return_code::accepted) {
8609  if (clean_session_) {
8610  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
8611  store_.clear();
8612  packet_id_.clear();
8613  }
8614  else {
8615  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
8616  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
8617  for (auto const& e : idx) {
8618  do_sync_write(e.message());
8619  }
8620  }
8621  }
8622  bool session_present = is_session_present(payload_[0]);
8623  mqtt_connected_ = true;
8624 
8625  switch (version_) {
8626  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8627  if (h_connack_) {
8628  return
8629  h_connack_(
8630  session_present,
8631  static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[1])
8632  );
8633  }
8634  break;
8635  case protocol_version::v5:
8636  if (h_v5_connack_) {
8637  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8638  char const* b = payload_.data() + 2;
8639  char const* it = b;
8640  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - 2;
8641  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8642  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8643  }
8644  else {
8645  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8646  return false;
8647  }
8648  return
8649  h_v5_connack_(
8650  session_present,
8651  static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[1]),
8652  std::move(props)
8653  );
8654  }
8655  break;
8656  default:
8657  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8658  return false;
8659  }
8660 
8661  return true;
8662  }
8663 
8664  template <typename F, typename AF>
8665  void auto_pub_response(F const& f, AF const& af) {
8666  if (auto_pub_response_) {
8667  if (auto_pub_response_async_) af();
8668  else f();
8669  }
8670  }
8671 
8672  bool handle_publish(async_handler_t const& func) {
8673  if (remaining_length_ < 2) {
8674  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8675  return false;
8676  }
8677  std::size_t i = 0;
8678  std::uint16_t topic_name_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
8679  i += 2;
8680 
8681  if (remaining_length_ < i + topic_name_length) {
8682  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8683  return false;
8684  }
8685  std::string topic_name(payload_.data() + i, topic_name_length);
8686  if (utf8string::validate_contents(topic_name) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
8687  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
8688  return false;
8689  }
8690  i += topic_name_length;
8691 
8692  mqtt::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id;
8693  auto qos = publish::get_qos(fixed_header_);
8694 
8695  auto handler_call =
8696  [&] {
8697  switch (version_) {
8698  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8699  if (h_publish_) {
8700  std::string contents(payload_.data() + i, payload_.size() - i);
8701  return h_publish_(fixed_header_, packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents));
8702  }
8703  break;
8704  case protocol_version::v5:
8705  if (h_v5_publish_) {
8706  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8707  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
8708  char const* it = b;
8709  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
8710  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8711  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8712  }
8713  else {
8714  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8715  return false;
8716  }
8717  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
8718  std::string contents(payload_.data() + i, payload_.size() - i);
8719  return h_v5_publish_(fixed_header_, packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), std::move(props));
8720  }
8721  break;
8722  default:
8723  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8724  return false;
8725  }
8726  return true;
8727  };
8728 
8729  switch (qos) {
8730  case qos::at_most_once:
8731  return handler_call();
8732  case qos::at_least_once: {
8733  if (remaining_length_ < i + sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8734  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8735  return false;
8736  }
8737  packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
8738  payload_.data() + i,
8739  payload_.data() + i + sizeof(packet_id_t)
8740  );
8741  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
8742  auto res = [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8743  auto_pub_response(
8744  [this, &packet_id] {
8745  if (connected_) send_puback(*packet_id);
8746  },
8747  [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8748  if (connected_) async_send_puback(*packet_id, mqtt::nullopt, std::vector<v5::property_variant>{}, func);
8749  }
8750  );
8751  };
8752  if (handler_call()) {
8753  res();
8754  return true;
8755  }
8756  return false;
8757  } break;
8758  case qos::exactly_once: {
8759  if (remaining_length_ < i + sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8760  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8761  return false;
8762  }
8763  packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
8764  payload_.data() + i,
8765  payload_.data() + i + sizeof(packet_id_t)
8766  );
8767  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
8768  auto res = [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8769  auto_pub_response(
8770  [this, &packet_id] {
8771  if (connected_) send_pubrec(*packet_id);
8772  },
8773  [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8774  if (connected_) async_send_pubrec(*packet_id, mqtt::nullopt, std::vector<v5::property_variant>{}, func);
8775  }
8776  );
8777  };
8778 
8779  switch (version_) {
8780  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8781  if (h_publish_) {
8782  auto it = qos2_publish_handled_.find(*packet_id);
8783  if (it == qos2_publish_handled_.end()) {
8784  std::string contents(payload_.data() + i, payload_.size() - i);
8785  if (h_publish_(fixed_header_, packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents))) {
8786  qos2_publish_handled_.emplace(*packet_id);
8787  res();
8788  return true;
8789  }
8790  return false;
8791  }
8792  }
8793  break;
8794  case protocol_version::v5:
8795  if (h_v5_publish_) {
8796  auto it = qos2_publish_handled_.find(*packet_id);
8797  if (it == qos2_publish_handled_.end()) {
8798  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8799  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
8800  char const* it = b;
8801  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
8802  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8803  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8804  }
8805  else {
8806  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8807  return false;
8808  }
8809  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
8810  std::string contents(payload_.data() + i, payload_.size() - i);
8811  if (h_v5_publish_(fixed_header_, packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), std::move(props))) {
8812  qos2_publish_handled_.emplace(*packet_id);
8813  res();
8814  return true;
8815  }
8816  return false;
8817  }
8818  }
8819  break;
8820  default:
8821  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8822  return false;
8823  }
8824  res();
8825  } break;
8826  default:
8827  break;
8828  }
8829  return true;
8830  }
8831 
8832  bool handle_puback(async_handler_t const& func) {
8833  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8834  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8835  return false;
8836  }
8837 
8838  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
8839  payload_.data(),
8840  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
8841  );
8842  {
8843  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
8844  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
8845  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(packet_id, control_packet_type::puback));
8846  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
8847  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
8848  }
8849  if (h_serialize_remove_) h_serialize_remove_(packet_id);
8850 
8851  switch (version_) {
8852  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8853  if (h_puback_) {
8854  return h_puback_(packet_id);
8855  }
8856  break;
8857  case protocol_version::v5:
8858  if (h_v5_puback_) {
8859  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8860 
8861  if (remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8862  return h_v5_puback_(packet_id, v5::reason_code::success, std::move(props));
8863  }
8864 
8865  char const* b = payload_.data() + 3;
8866  char const* it = b;
8867  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - 3;
8868  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8869  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8870  }
8871  else {
8872  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8873  return false;
8874  }
8875  return h_v5_puback_(packet_id, static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[sizeof(packet_id_t)]), std::move(props));
8876  }
8877  break;
8878  default:
8879  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8880  return false;
8881  }
8882  return true;
8883  }
8884 
8885  bool handle_pubrec(async_handler_t const& func) {
8886  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8887  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8888  return false;
8889  }
8890 
8891  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
8892  payload_.data(),
8893  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
8894  );
8895  {
8896  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
8897  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
8898  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(packet_id, control_packet_type::pubrec));
8899  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
8900  // packet_id shouldn't be erased here.
8901  // It is reused for pubrel/pubcomp.
8902  }
8903  auto res = [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8904  auto_pub_response(
8905  [this, &packet_id] {
8906  if (connected_) send_pubrel(packet_id);
8907  else store_pubrel(packet_id);
8908  },
8909  [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8910  if (connected_) async_send_pubrel(packet_id, mqtt::nullopt, std::vector<v5::property_variant>{}, func);
8911  else store_pubrel(packet_id);
8912  }
8913  );
8914  };
8915 
8916  switch (version_) {
8917  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8918  if (h_pubrec_) {
8919  if (h_pubrec_(packet_id)) {
8920  res();
8921  return true;
8922  }
8923  return false;
8924  }
8925  break;
8926  case protocol_version::v5:
8927  if (h_v5_pubrec_) {
8928  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8929 
8930  if (remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8931  if (h_v5_pubrec_(packet_id, v5::reason_code::success, std::move(props))) {
8932  res();
8933  return true;
8934  }
8935  return false;
8936  }
8937 
8938  char const* b = payload_.data() + 3;
8939  char const* it = b;
8940  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - 3;
8941  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
8942  props = std::move(*props_opt);
8943  }
8944  else {
8945  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8946  return false;
8947  }
8948  if (h_v5_pubrec_(packet_id, static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[sizeof(packet_id_t)]), std::move(props))) {
8949  res();
8950  return true;
8951  }
8952  return false;
8953  }
8954  break;
8955  default:
8956  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
8957  return false;
8958  }
8959  res();
8960  return true;
8961  }
8962 
8963  bool handle_pubrel(async_handler_t const& func) {
8964  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8965  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8966  return false;
8967  }
8968 
8969  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
8970  payload_.data(),
8971  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
8972  );
8973  auto res = [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8974  auto_pub_response(
8975  [this, &packet_id] {
8976  if (connected_) send_pubcomp(packet_id);
8977  },
8978  [this, &packet_id, &func] {
8979  if (connected_) async_send_pubcomp(packet_id, mqtt::nullopt, std::vector<v5::property_variant>{}, func);
8980  }
8981  );
8982  };
8983  qos2_publish_handled_.erase(packet_id);
8984  switch (version_) {
8985  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8986  if (h_pubrel_) {
8987  if (h_pubrel_(packet_id)) {
8988  res();
8989  return true;
8990  }
8991  return false;
8992  }
8993  break;
8994  case protocol_version::v5:
8995  if (h_v5_pubrel_) {
8996  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
8997 
8998  if (remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
8999  if (h_v5_pubrel_(packet_id, v5::reason_code::success, std::move(props))) {
9000  res();
9001  return true;
9002  }
9003  return false;
9004  }
9005 
9006  char const* b = payload_.data() + 3;
9007  char const* it = b;
9008  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - 3;
9009  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9010  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9011  }
9012  else {
9013  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9014  return false;
9015  }
9016  if (h_v5_pubrel_(packet_id, static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[sizeof(packet_id_t)]), std::move(props))) {
9017  res();
9018  return true;
9019  }
9020  return false;
9021  }
9022  break;
9023  default:
9024  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9025  return false;
9026  }
9027  res();
9028  return true;
9029  }
9030 
9031  bool handle_pubcomp(async_handler_t const& func) {
9032  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9033  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9034  return false;
9035  }
9036 
9037  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
9038  payload_.data(),
9039  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
9040  );
9041  {
9042  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9043  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
9044  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(packet_id, control_packet_type::pubcomp));
9045  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
9046  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
9047  }
9048  if (h_serialize_remove_) h_serialize_remove_(packet_id);
9049  switch (version_) {
9050  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9051  if (h_pubcomp_) {
9052  return h_pubcomp_(packet_id);
9053  }
9054  break;
9055  case protocol_version::v5:
9056  if (h_v5_pubcomp_) {
9057  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9058 
9059  if (remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9060  return h_v5_pubcomp_(packet_id, v5::reason_code::success, std::move(props));
9061  }
9062 
9063  char const* b = payload_.data() + 3;
9064  char const* it = b;
9065  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - 3;
9066  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9067  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9068  }
9069  else {
9070  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9071  return false;
9072  }
9073  return h_v5_pubcomp_(packet_id, static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[sizeof(packet_id_t)]), std::move(props));
9074  }
9075  break;
9076  default:
9077  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9078  return false;
9079  }
9080  return true;
9081  }
9082 
9083  bool handle_subscribe(async_handler_t const& func) {
9084  std::size_t i = 0;
9085  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9086  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9087  return false;
9088  }
9089  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
9090  payload_.data(),
9091  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
9092  );
9093  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
9094 
9095  switch (version_) {
9096  case protocol_version::v3_1_1: {
9097  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> entries;
9098  while (i < remaining_length_) {
9099  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
9100  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9101  return false;
9102  }
9103  std::uint16_t topic_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
9104  i += 2;
9105 
9106  if (remaining_length_ < i + topic_length) {
9107  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9108  return false;
9109  }
9110  std::string topic_filter(payload_.data() + i, topic_length);
9111  if (utf8string::validate_contents(topic_filter) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
9112  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
9113  return false;
9114  }
9115  i += topic_length;
9116 
9117  if (remaining_length_ < i + 1) {
9118  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9119  return false;
9120  }
9121 
9122  std::uint8_t options = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[i]);
9123  if ((options & 0b11111100) != 0) {
9124  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error));
9125  return false;
9126  }
9127  entries.emplace_back(std::move(topic_filter), options);
9128  ++i;
9129  }
9130  if (h_subscribe_) return h_subscribe_(packet_id, std::move(entries));
9131  } break;
9132  case protocol_version::v5: {
9133  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9134  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9135  char const* it = b;
9136  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9137  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9138  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9139  }
9140  else {
9141  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9142  return false;
9143  }
9144  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
9145 
9146  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> entries;
9147  while (i < remaining_length_) {
9148  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
9149  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9150  return false;
9151  }
9152  std::uint16_t topic_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
9153  i += 2;
9154 
9155  if (remaining_length_ < i + topic_length) {
9156  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9157  return false;
9158  }
9159  std::string topic_filter(payload_.data() + i, topic_length);
9160  if (utf8string::validate_contents(topic_filter) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
9161  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
9162  return false;
9163  }
9164  i += topic_length;
9165 
9166  if (remaining_length_ < i + 1) {
9167  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9168  return false;
9169  }
9170 
9171  std::uint8_t options = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[i]);
9172  if ((options & 0b11000000) != 0) {
9173  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error));
9174  return false;
9175  }
9176  entries.emplace_back(std::move(topic_filter), options);
9177  ++i;
9178  }
9179  if (h_v5_subscribe_) return h_v5_subscribe_(packet_id, std::move(entries), std::move(props));
9180  } break;
9181  default:
9182  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9183  return false;
9184  }
9185  return true;
9186  }
9187 
9188  bool handle_suback(async_handler_t const& func) {
9189  std::size_t i = 0;
9190  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9191  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9192  return false;
9193  }
9194  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
9195  payload_.data(),
9196  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
9197  );
9198  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
9199  {
9200  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9201  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
9202  }
9203 
9204  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9205  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9206  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9207  char const* it = b;
9208  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9209  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9210  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9211  }
9212  else {
9213  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9214  return false;
9215  }
9216  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
9217  }
9218 
9219  switch (version_) {
9220  case protocol_version::v3_1_1: {
9221  std::vector<mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t>> results;
9222  results.reserve(payload_.size() - i);
9223  auto it = payload_.cbegin() + static_cast<std::vector<char>::difference_type>(i);
9224  auto end = payload_.cend();
9225  for (; it != end; ++it) {
9226  if (*it & 0b10000000) {
9227  results.push_back(mqtt::nullopt);
9228  }
9229  else {
9230  results.push_back(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*it));
9231  }
9232  }
9233  if (h_suback_) return h_suback_(packet_id, std::move(results));
9234  } break;
9235  case protocol_version::v5: {
9236  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons;
9237  reasons.reserve(payload_.size() - i);
9238  auto it = payload_.cbegin() + static_cast<std::vector<char>::difference_type>(i);
9239  auto end = payload_.cend();
9240  std::copy(it, end, std::back_inserter(reasons));
9241  if (h_v5_suback_) return h_v5_suback_(packet_id, std::move(reasons), std::move(props));
9242  } break;
9243  default:
9244  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9245  return false;
9246  }
9247  return true;
9248  }
9249 
9250  bool handle_unsubscribe(async_handler_t const& func) {
9251  std::size_t i = 0;
9252  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9253  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9254  return false;
9255  }
9256  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
9257  payload_.data(),
9258  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
9259  );
9260  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
9261 
9262  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9263  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9264  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9265  char const* it = b;
9266  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9267  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9268  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9269  }
9270  else {
9271  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9272  return false;
9273  }
9274  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
9275  }
9276 
9277  std::vector<std::string> topic_filters;
9278  while (i < remaining_length_) {
9279  if (remaining_length_ < i + 2) {
9280  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9281  return false;
9282  }
9283  std::uint16_t topic_length = make_uint16_t(payload_[i], payload_[i + 1]);
9284  i += 2;
9285  if (remaining_length_ < i + topic_length) {
9286  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9287  return false;
9288  }
9289  std::string topic_filter(payload_.data() + i, topic_length);
9290  if (utf8string::validate_contents(topic_filter) != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
9291  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::bad_message));
9292  return false;
9293  }
9294  i += topic_length;
9295 
9296  topic_filters.emplace_back(std::move(topic_filter));
9297  }
9298 
9299  switch (version_) {
9300  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9301  if (h_unsubscribe_) return h_unsubscribe_(packet_id, std::move(topic_filters));
9302  break;
9303  case protocol_version::v5:
9304  if (h_v5_unsubscribe_) return h_v5_unsubscribe_(packet_id, std::move(topic_filters), std::move(props));
9305  break;
9306  default:
9307  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9308  return false;
9309  }
9310  return true;
9311  }
9312 
9313  bool handle_unsuback(async_handler_t const& func) {
9314  std::size_t i = 0;
9315  if (remaining_length_ < sizeof(packet_id_t)) {
9316  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9317  return false;
9318  }
9319  packet_id_t packet_id = make_packet_id<PacketIdBytes>::apply(
9320  payload_.data(),
9321  payload_.data() + sizeof(packet_id_t)
9322  );
9323  i += sizeof(packet_id_t);
9324 
9325  {
9326  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9327  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
9328  }
9329 
9330  switch (version_) {
9331  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9332  if (h_unsuback_) return h_unsuback_(packet_id);
9333  break;
9334  case protocol_version::v5: {
9335  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9336  {
9337  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9338  char const* it = b;
9339  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9340  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9341  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9342  }
9343  else {
9344  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9345  return false;
9346  }
9347  i += static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, it));
9348  }
9349  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons;
9350  {
9351  reasons.reserve(payload_.size() - i);
9352  auto it = payload_.cbegin() + static_cast<std::vector<char>::difference_type>(i);
9353  auto end = payload_.cend();
9354  std::copy(it, end, std::back_inserter(reasons));
9355  }
9356  if (h_v5_unsuback_) return h_v5_unsuback_(packet_id, std::move(reasons), std::move(props));
9357  } break;
9358  default:
9359  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9360  return false;
9361  }
9362  return true;
9363  }
9364 
9365  bool handle_pingreq(async_handler_t const& /*func*/) {
9366  if (h_pingreq_) return h_pingreq_();
9367  return true;
9368  }
9369 
9370  bool handle_pingresp(async_handler_t const& /*func*/) {
9371  if (h_pingresp_) return h_pingresp_();
9372  return true;
9373  }
9374 
9375  void handle_disconnect(async_handler_t const& func) {
9376  switch (version_) {
9377  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9378  if (h_disconnect_) h_disconnect_();
9379  break;
9380  case protocol_version::v5: {
9381  std::size_t i = 0;
9382  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9383  if (remaining_length_ < 1) {
9384  if (h_v5_disconnect_) h_v5_disconnect_(v5::reason_code::normal_disconnection, std::move(props));
9385  return;
9386  }
9387 
9388  auto reason = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[i]);
9389  ++i;
9390 
9391  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9392  char const* it = b;
9393  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9394  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9395  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9396  }
9397  else {
9398  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9399  return;
9400  }
9401 
9402  if (h_v5_disconnect_) h_v5_disconnect_(reason, std::move(props));
9403  } break;
9404  default:
9405  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9406  break;
9407  }
9408  }
9409 
9410  bool handle_auth(async_handler_t const& func) {
9411  switch (version_) {
9412  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9413  return false;
9414  case protocol_version::v5: {
9415  std::size_t i = 0;
9416  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9417  if (remaining_length_ < 1) {
9418  if (h_v5_auth_) h_v5_auth_(v5::reason_code::success, std::move(props));
9419  return true;
9420  }
9421 
9422  auto reason = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(payload_[i]);
9423  ++i;
9424 
9425  char const* b = payload_.data() + i;
9426  char const* it = b;
9427  char const* e = b + payload_.size() - i;
9428  if (auto props_opt = v5::property::parse_with_length(it, e)) {
9429  props = std::move(*props_opt);
9430  }
9431  else {
9432  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
9433  return false;
9434  }
9435 
9436  if (h_v5_auth_) return h_v5_auth_(reason, std::move(props));
9437  } break;
9438  default:
9439  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9440  return false;
9441  }
9442  return true;
9443  }
9444 
9445  // Blocking senders.
9446  void send_connect(
9447  std::string const& client_id,
9448  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
9449  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
9450  mqtt::optional<will> const& w,
9451  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
9452  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
9453  ) {
9454  switch (version_) {
9455  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9456  do_sync_write(
9457  v3_1_1::connect_message(
9458  keep_alive_sec,
9459  client_id,
9460  clean_session_,
9461  w,
9462  user_name,
9463  password
9464  )
9465  );
9466  break;
9467  case protocol_version::v5:
9468  do_sync_write(
9469  v5::connect_message(
9470  keep_alive_sec,
9471  client_id,
9472  clean_session_,
9473  w,
9474  user_name,
9475  password,
9476  std::move(props)
9477  )
9478  );
9479  break;
9480  default:
9481  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9482  break;
9483  }
9484  }
9485 
9486  void send_connack(
9487  bool session_present,
9488  std::uint8_t reason_code,
9489  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
9490  ) {
9491  switch (version_) {
9492  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9493  do_sync_write(
9494  v3_1_1::connack_message(
9495  session_present,
9496  reason_code
9497  )
9498  );
9499  break;
9500  case protocol_version::v5:
9501  do_sync_write(
9502  v5::connack_message(
9503  session_present,
9504  reason_code,
9505  std::move(props)
9506  )
9507  );
9508  break;
9509  default:
9510  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9511  break;
9512  }
9513  }
9514 
9515  void send_publish(
9516  as::const_buffer topic_name,
9517  std::uint8_t qos,
9518  bool retain,
9519  bool dup,
9520  packet_id_t packet_id,
9521  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
9522  as::const_buffer payload,
9523  mqtt::any life_keeper) {
9524 
9525  auto msg =
9526  basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
9527  topic_name,
9528  qos,
9529  retain,
9530  dup,
9531  packet_id,
9532  payload
9533  );
9534 
9535  auto do_send_publish =
9536  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
9537 
9538  if (qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once) {
9539  auto store_msg = msg;
9540  store_msg.set_dup(true);
9541  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9542  store_.emplace(
9543  packet_id,
9544  qos == qos::at_least_once
9545  ? control_packet_type::puback
9546  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
9547  store_msg,
9548  std::move(life_keeper)
9549  );
9550  if (serialize_publish) {
9551  serialize_publish(store_msg);
9552  }
9553  }
9554  do_sync_write(msg);
9555  };
9556 
9557  switch (version_) {
9558  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9559  do_send_publish(
9560  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
9561  topic_name,
9562  qos,
9563  retain,
9564  dup,
9565  packet_id,
9566  payload
9567  ),
9568  h_serialize_publish_
9569  );
9570  break;
9571  case protocol_version::v5:
9572  do_send_publish(
9573  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
9574  topic_name,
9575  qos,
9576  retain,
9577  dup,
9578  packet_id,
9579  std::move(props),
9580  payload
9581  ),
9582  h_serialize_v5_publish_
9583  );
9584  break;
9585  default:
9586  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9587  break;
9588  }
9589  }
9590 
9591  void send_puback(
9592  packet_id_t packet_id,
9593  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9594  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9595  ) {
9596  switch (version_) {
9597  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9598  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
9599  break;
9600  case protocol_version::v5:
9601  do_sync_write(v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
9602  break;
9603  default:
9604  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9605  break;
9606  }
9607 
9608  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
9609  }
9610 
9611  void send_pubrec(
9612  packet_id_t packet_id,
9613  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9614  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9615  ) {
9616  switch (version_) {
9617  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9618  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
9619  break;
9620  case protocol_version::v5:
9621  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
9622  break;
9623  default:
9624  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9625  break;
9626  }
9627  }
9628 
9629  void send_pubrel(
9630  packet_id_t packet_id,
9631  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9632  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9633  ) {
9634 
9635  auto impl =
9636  [&](auto&& msg, auto const& serialize) {
9637  {
9638  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9639 
9640  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
9641  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
9642 
9643  auto ret = store_.emplace(
9644  packet_id,
9645  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
9646  msg
9647  );
9648  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
9649  }
9650 
9651  if (serialize) {
9652  serialize(msg);
9653  }
9654  do_sync_write(msg);
9655  };
9656 
9657  switch (version_) {
9658  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9659  impl(
9660  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
9661  h_serialize_pubrel_
9662  );
9663  break;
9664  case protocol_version::v5:
9665  impl(
9666  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
9667  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
9668  );
9669  break;
9670  default:
9671  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9672  break;
9673  }
9674  }
9675 
9676  void store_pubrel(
9677  packet_id_t packet_id,
9678  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9679  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9680  ) {
9681 
9682  auto impl =
9683  [&](auto&& msg, auto const& serialize) {
9684  {
9685  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
9686 
9687  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
9688  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
9689 
9690  auto ret = store_.emplace(
9691  packet_id,
9692  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
9693  msg
9694  );
9695  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
9696  }
9697 
9698  if (serialize) {
9699  serialize(msg);
9700  }
9701  };
9702 
9703  switch (version_) {
9704  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9705  impl(
9706  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
9707  h_serialize_pubrel_
9708  );
9709  break;
9710  case protocol_version::v5:
9711  impl(
9712  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
9713  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
9714  );
9715  break;
9716  default:
9717  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9718  break;
9719  }
9720  }
9721 
9722  void send_pubcomp(
9723  packet_id_t packet_id,
9724  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9725  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9726  ) {
9727  switch (version_) {
9728  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9729  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
9730  break;
9731  case protocol_version::v5:
9732  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
9733  break;
9734  default:
9735  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9736  break;
9737  }
9738 
9739  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
9740  }
9741 
9742  template <typename... Args>
9743  void send_subscribe(
9744  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
9745  packet_id_t packet_id,
9746  as::const_buffer topic_name,
9747  std::uint8_t qos,
9748  Args&&... args) {
9749  params.emplace_back(topic_name, qos);
9750  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9751  }
9752 
9753  template <typename... Args>
9754  void send_subscribe(
9755  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
9756  packet_id_t packet_id,
9757  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
9758  std::uint8_t qos,
9759  Args&&... args) {
9760  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), qos);
9761  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9762  }
9763 
9764  void send_subscribe(
9765  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
9766  packet_id_t packet_id,
9767  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9768  ) {
9769  for(auto const& p : params)
9770  {
9771  BOOST_ASSERT(
9772  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::at_most_once ||
9773  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::at_least_once ||
9774  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::exactly_once
9775  );
9776  }
9777  switch (version_) {
9778  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9779  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
9780  break;
9781  case protocol_version::v5:
9782  do_sync_write(v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
9783  break;
9784  default:
9785  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9786  break;
9787  }
9788  }
9789 
9790  template <typename... Args>
9791  void send_suback(
9792  std::vector<std::uint8_t>& params,
9793  packet_id_t packet_id,
9794  std::uint8_t reason,
9795  Args&&... args) {
9796  params.push_back(reason);
9797  send_suback(params, packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9798  }
9799 
9800  void send_suback(
9801  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
9802  packet_id_t packet_id,
9803  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9804  ) {
9805  switch (version_) {
9806  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9807  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
9808  break;
9809  case protocol_version::v5:
9810  do_sync_write(v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
9811  break;
9812  default:
9813  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9814  break;
9815  }
9816  }
9817 
9818  template <typename... Args>
9819  void send_unsubscribe(
9820  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
9821  packet_id_t packet_id,
9822  as::const_buffer topic_name,
9823  Args&&... args) {
9824  params.emplace_back(std::move(topic_name));
9825  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9826  }
9827 
9828  template <typename... Args>
9829  void send_unsubscribe(
9830  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
9831  packet_id_t packet_id,
9832  mqtt::string_view topic_name,
9833  Args&&... args) {
9834  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()));
9835  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9836  }
9837 
9838  void send_unsubscribe(
9839  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
9840  packet_id_t packet_id,
9841  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9842  ) {
9843  switch (version_) {
9844  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9845  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
9846  break;
9847  case protocol_version::v5:
9848  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
9849  break;
9850  default:
9851  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9852  break;
9853  }
9854  }
9855 
9856  void send_unsuback(
9857  packet_id_t packet_id
9858  ) {
9859  switch (version_) {
9860  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9861  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
9862  break;
9863  case protocol_version::v5:
9864  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9865  break;
9866  default:
9867  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9868  break;
9869  }
9870  }
9871 
9872  template <typename... Args>
9873  void send_unsuback(
9874  std::vector<std::uint8_t>&& params,
9875  packet_id_t packet_id,
9876  std::uint8_t reason,
9877  Args&&... args) {
9878  params.push_back(reason);
9879  send_suback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
9880  }
9881 
9882  void send_unsuback(
9883  std::vector<std::uint8_t>&& params,
9884  packet_id_t packet_id,
9885  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9886  ) {
9887  switch (version_) {
9888  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9889  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9890  break;
9891  case protocol_version::v5:
9892  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
9893  break;
9894  default:
9895  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9896  break;
9897  }
9898  }
9899 
9900  void send_pingreq() {
9901  switch (version_) {
9902  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9903  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message());
9904  break;
9905  case protocol_version::v5:
9906  do_sync_write(v5::pingreq_message());
9907  break;
9908  default:
9909  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9910  break;
9911  }
9912  }
9913 
9914  void send_pingresp() {
9915  switch (version_) {
9916  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9917  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message());
9918  break;
9919  case protocol_version::v5:
9920  do_sync_write(v5::pingresp_message());
9921  break;
9922  default:
9923  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9924  break;
9925  }
9926  }
9927 
9928  void send_auth(
9929  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9930  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9931  ) {
9932  switch (version_) {
9933  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9934  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9935  break;
9936  case protocol_version::v5:
9937  do_sync_write(v5::auth_message(reason, std::move(props)));
9938  break;
9939  default:
9940  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9941  break;
9942  }
9943  }
9944 
9945  void send_disconnect(
9946  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = mqtt::nullopt,
9947  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
9948  ) {
9949  switch (version_) {
9950  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9951  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message());
9952  break;
9953  case protocol_version::v5:
9954  do_sync_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, std::move(props)));
9955  break;
9956  default:
9957  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
9958  break;
9959  }
9960  }
9961 
9962  // Blocking write
9963  template <typename MessageVariant>
9964  void do_sync_write(MessageVariant&& mv) {
9965  boost::system::error_code ec;
9966  if (!connected_) return;
9967  if (h_pre_send_) h_pre_send_();
9968  write(*socket_, const_buffer_sequence<PacketIdBytes>(std::forward<MessageVariant>(mv)), ec);
9969  if (ec) handle_error(ec);
9970  }
9971 
9972  // Non blocking (async) senders
9973  void async_send_connect(
9974  std::string const& client_id,
9975  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
9976  mqtt::optional<std::string> const& password,
9977  mqtt::optional<will> const& w,
9978  bool clean_session,
9979  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
9980  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
9981  async_handler_t func) {
9982 
9983  clean_session_ = clean_session;
9984 
9985  switch (version_) {
9986  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
9987  do_async_write(
9988  v3_1_1::connect_message(
9989  keep_alive_sec,
9990  client_id,
9991  clean_session_,
9992  w,
9993  user_name,
9994  password
9995  ),
9996  std::move(func)
9997  );
9998  break;
9999  case protocol_version::v5:
10000  do_async_write(
10001  v5::connect_message(
10002  keep_alive_sec,
10003  client_id,
10004  clean_session_,
10005  w,
10006  user_name,
10007  password,
10008  std::move(props)
10009  ),
10010  std::move(func)
10011  );
10012  break;
10013  default:
10014  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10015  break;
10016  }
10017  }
10018 
10019  void async_send_connack(
10020  bool session_present,
10021  std::uint8_t reason_code,
10022  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10023  async_handler_t func
10024  ) {
10025  switch (version_) {
10026  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10027  do_async_write(
10028  v3_1_1::connack_message(
10029  session_present,
10030  reason_code
10031  ),
10032  std::move(func)
10033  );
10034  break;
10035  case protocol_version::v5:
10036  do_async_write(
10037  v5::connack_message(
10038  session_present,
10039  reason_code,
10040  std::move(props)
10041  ),
10042  std::move(func)
10043  );
10044  break;
10045  default:
10046  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10047  break;
10048  }
10049  }
10050 
10051  void async_send_publish(
10052  as::const_buffer topic_name,
10053  std::uint8_t qos,
10054  bool retain,
10055  bool dup,
10056  packet_id_t packet_id,
10057  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10058  as::const_buffer payload,
10059  async_handler_t func,
10060  mqtt::any life_keeper) {
10061 
10062  auto do_async_send_publish =
10063  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
10064  if (qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once) {
10065  auto store_msg = msg;
10066  store_msg.set_dup(true);
10067  {
10068  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10069  auto ret = store_.emplace(
10070  packet_id,
10071  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
10072  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
10073  store_msg,
10074  life_keeper
10075  );
10076  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
10077  }
10078 
10079  if (serialize_publish) {
10080  serialize_publish(store_msg);
10081  }
10082  }
10083  do_async_write(
10084  std::move(msg),
10085  [life_keeper = std::move(life_keeper), func = std::move(func)](boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10086  if (func) func(ec);
10087  }
10088  );
10089  };
10090 
10091  switch (version_) {
10092  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10093  do_async_send_publish(
10094  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10095  topic_name,
10096  qos,
10097  retain,
10098  dup,
10099  packet_id,
10100  payload
10101  ),
10102  h_serialize_publish_
10103  );
10104  break;
10105  case protocol_version::v5:
10106  do_async_send_publish(
10107  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10108  topic_name,
10109  qos,
10110  retain,
10111  dup,
10112  packet_id,
10113  std::move(props),
10114  payload
10115  ),
10116  h_serialize_v5_publish_
10117  );
10118  break;
10119  default:
10120  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10121  break;
10122  }
10123  }
10124 
10125  void async_send_puback(
10126  packet_id_t packet_id,
10127  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
10128  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10129  async_handler_t func
10130  ) {
10131 
10132  auto impl =
10133  [&] (auto&& msg) {
10134  auto self = this->shared_from_this();
10135  do_async_write(
10136  std::move(msg),
10137  [this, self, packet_id, func = std::move(func)]
10138  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
10139  if (func) func(ec);
10140  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
10141  }
10142  );
10143  };
10144 
10145  switch (version_) {
10146  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10147  impl(
10148  v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id)
10149  );
10150  break;
10151  case protocol_version::v5:
10152  impl(
10153  v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props))
10154  );
10155  break;
10156  default:
10157  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10158  break;
10159  }
10160  }
10161 
10162  void async_send_pubrec(
10163  packet_id_t packet_id,
10164  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
10165  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10166  async_handler_t func
10167  ) {
10168  switch (version_) {
10169  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10170  do_async_write(
10171  v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
10172  std::move(func)
10173  );
10174  break;
10175  case protocol_version::v5:
10176  do_async_write(
10177  v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
10178  std::move(func)
10179  );
10180  break;
10181  default:
10182  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10183  break;
10184  }
10185  }
10186 
10187  void async_send_pubrel(
10188  packet_id_t packet_id,
10189  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
10190  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10191  async_handler_t func
10192  ) {
10193 
10194  auto msg = basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id);
10195 
10196  auto impl =
10197  [&](auto&& msg, auto const& serialize) {
10198  {
10199  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10200 
10201  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
10202  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
10203 
10204  auto ret = store_.emplace(
10205  packet_id,
10206  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
10207  msg
10208  );
10209  // publish store is erased when pubrec is received.
10210  // pubrel store is erased when pubcomp is received.
10211  // If invalid client send pubrec twice with the same packet id,
10212  // then send corresponding pubrel twice is a possible client/server
10213  // implementation.
10214  // In this case, overwrite store_.
10215  if (!ret.second) {
10216  store_.modify(
10217  ret.first,
10218  [&] (auto& e) {
10219  e = store(
10220  packet_id,
10221  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
10222  msg
10223  );
10224  }
10225  );
10226  }
10227  }
10228 
10229  if (serialize) {
10230  serialize(msg);
10231  }
10232  do_async_write(std::move(msg), std::move(func));
10233  };
10234 
10235  switch (version_) {
10236  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10237  impl(
10238  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
10239  h_serialize_pubrel_
10240  );
10241  break;
10242  case protocol_version::v5:
10243  impl(
10244  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
10245  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
10246  );
10247  break;
10248  default:
10249  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10250  break;
10251  }
10252  }
10253 
10254  void async_send_pubcomp(
10255  packet_id_t packet_id,
10256  mqtt::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
10257  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10258  async_handler_t func
10259  ) {
10260  auto impl =
10261  [&] (auto&& msg) {
10262  auto self = this->shared_from_this();
10263  do_async_write(
10264  std::move(msg),
10265  [this, self, packet_id, func = std::move(func)]
10266  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
10267  if (func) func(ec);
10268  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
10269  }
10270  );
10271  };
10272  switch (version_) {
10273  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10274  impl(
10275  v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id)
10276  );
10277  break;
10278  case protocol_version::v5:
10279  impl(
10280  v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props))
10281  );
10282  break;
10283  default:
10284  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10285  break;
10286  }
10287  }
10288 
10289  template <typename... Args>
10290  void async_send_subscribe(
10291  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
10292  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10293  packet_id_t packet_id,
10294  as::const_buffer topic_name,
10295  std::uint8_t qos,
10296  Args&&... args) {
10297  params.emplace_back(std::move(topic_name), qos);
10298  async_send_subscribe(std::move(params), std::move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
10299  }
10300 
10301  template <typename... Args>
10302  void async_send_subscribe(
10303  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
10304  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10305  packet_id_t packet_id,
10306  std::string topic_name,
10307  std::uint8_t qos,
10308  Args&&... args) {
10309 
10310  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
10311  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic), qos);
10312  async_send_subscribe(std::move(params), std::make_pair(std::move(life_keepers), std::move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
10313  }
10314 
10315  void async_send_subscribe(
10316  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
10317  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10318  packet_id_t packet_id,
10319  async_handler_t func) {
10320 
10321  switch (version_) {
10322  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10323  do_async_write(
10324  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id),
10325  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10326  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10327  if (func) func(ec);
10328  }
10329  );
10330  break;
10331  case protocol_version::v5:
10332  do_async_write(
10333  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, {}),
10334  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10335  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10336  if (func) func(ec);
10337  }
10338  );
10339  break;
10340  default:
10341  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10342  break;
10343  }
10344  }
10345 
10346  void async_send_subscribe(
10347  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>&& params,
10348  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10349  packet_id_t packet_id,
10350  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10351  async_handler_t func) {
10352 
10353  switch (version_) {
10354  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10355  do_async_write(
10356  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id),
10357  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10358  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10359  if (func) func(ec);
10360  }
10361  );
10362  break;
10363  case protocol_version::v5:
10364  do_async_write(
10365  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)),
10366  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10367  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10368  if (func) func(ec);
10369  }
10370  );
10371  break;
10372  default:
10373  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10374  break;
10375  }
10376  }
10377

10380  std::vector<std::uint8_t>&& params,
10381  packet_id_t packet_id,
10382  std::uint8_t qos,
10383  Args&&... args) {
10384  params.push_back(qos);
10385  async_send_suback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
10386  }
10387 
10388  void async_send_suback(
10389  std::vector<std::uint8_t>&& params,
10390  packet_id_t packet_id,
10391  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10392  async_handler_t func
10393  ) {
10394  switch (version_) {
10395  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10396  do_async_write(
10397  v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id), std::move(func)
10398  );
10399  break;
10400  case protocol_version::v5:
10401  do_async_write(
10402  v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)), std::move(func)
10403  );
10404  break;
10405  default:
10406  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10407  break;
10408  }
10409  }

10415  packet_id_t packet_id,
10416  as::const_buffer topic_name,
10417  Args&&... args) {

10419  async_send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), std::move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
10420  }
10421 
10422  template <typename... Args>
10423  void async_send_unsubscribe(
10424  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
10425  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10426  packet_id_t packet_id,
10427  std::string topic_name,
10428  Args&&... args) {
10429 
10430  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
10431  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic));
10432  async_send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), std::make_pair(std::move(life_keepers), std::move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
10433  }
10434 
10435  void async_send_unsubscribe(
10436  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
10437  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10438  packet_id_t packet_id,
10439  async_handler_t func) {
10440 
10441  switch (version_) {
10442  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10443  do_async_write(
10444  v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10445  std::move(params),
10446  packet_id
10447  ),
10448  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10449  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10450  if (func) func(ec);
10451  }
10452  );
10453  break;
10454  case protocol_version::v5:
10455  do_async_write(
10456  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10457  std::move(params),
10458  packet_id,
10459  {}
10460  ),
10461  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10462  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10463  if (func) func(ec);
10464  }
10465  );
10466  break;
10467  default:
10468  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10469  break;
10470  }
10471  }
10472 
10473  void async_send_unsubscribe(
10474  std::vector<as::const_buffer>&& params,
10475  mqtt::any life_keepers,
10476  packet_id_t packet_id,
10477  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10478  async_handler_t func) {
10479 
10480  switch (version_) {
10481  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:

10484  std::move(params),
10485  packet_id
10486  ),
10487  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10488  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10489  if (func) func(ec);
10490  }
10491  );
10492  break;
10493  case protocol_version::v5:
10494  do_async_write(
10495  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10496  std::move(params),
10497  packet_id,
10498  std::move(props)
10499  ),
10500  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
10501  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10502  if (func) func(ec);
10503  }
10504  );
10505  break;

10509  }
10510  }
10511 
10512  void async_send_unsuback(

10518  );
10519  break;
10520  case protocol_version::v5:
10521  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10522  break;
10523  default:

10525  break;
10526  }
10527  }

10538 
10539  void async_send_unsuback(
10540  std::vector<std::uint8_t>&& params,
10541  packet_id_t packet_id,
10542  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10543  async_handler_t func
10544  ) {
10545  switch (version_) {
10546  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10547  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10548  break;
10549  case protocol_version::v5:
10550  do_async_write(
10551  v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(
10552  std::move(params),
10553  packet_id,
10554  std::move(props)
10555  ),
10556  std::move(func)
10557  );
10558  break;
10559  default:
10560  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10561  break;
10562  }
10563  }
10564 
10565  void async_send_pingreq(async_handler_t func) {
10566  switch (version_) {
10567  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10568  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message(), std::move(func));
10569  break;
10570  case protocol_version::v5:
10571  do_async_write(v5::pingreq_message(), std::move(func));
10572  break;
10573  default:
10574  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10575  break;
10576  }
10577  }
10578

10580  switch (version_) {
10581  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10582  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message(), std::move(func));
10583  break;
10584  case protocol_version::v5:
10585  do_async_write(v5::pingresp_message(), std::move(func));
10586  break;
10587  default:
