10590  }
10591  }
10592 
10593  void async_send_auth(
10594  std::uint8_t reason,
10595  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10596  async_handler_t func
10597  ) {
10598  switch (version_) {
10599  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10600  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10601  break;
10602  case protocol_version::v5:
10603  do_async_write(v5::auth_message(reason, std::move(props)), std::move(func));
10604  break;
10605  default:
10606  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10607  break;
10608  }
10609  }
10610 
10611  void async_send_disconnect(
10612  async_handler_t func
10613  ) {
10614  switch (version_) {
10615  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10616  do_async_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message(), std::move(func));
10617  break;
10618  case protocol_version::v5:
10619  do_async_write(v5::disconnect_message(mqtt::nullopt, {}), std::move(func));
10620  break;
10621  default:
10622  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10623  break;
10624  }
10625  }
10626 
10627  void async_send_disconnect(
10628  std::uint8_t reason,
10629  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
10630  async_handler_t func
10631  ) {
10632  switch (version_) {
10633  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10634  do_async_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message(), std::move(func));
10635  break;
10636  case protocol_version::v5:
10637  do_async_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, std::move(props)), std::move(func));
10638  break;
10639  default:
10640  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10641  break;
10642  }
10643  }
10644 
10645  // Non blocking (async) write
10646 
10647  class async_packet {
10648  public:
10649  async_packet(
10650  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv,
10651  async_handler_t h = async_handler_t())
10652  : mv_(std::move(mv))
10653  , handler_(std::move(h)) {}
10654  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> const& message() const {
10655  return mv_;
10656  }
10657  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>& message() {
10658  return mv_;
10659  }
10660  async_handler_t const& handler() const { return handler_; }
10661  async_handler_t& handler() { return handler_; }
10662  private:
10663  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv_;
10664  async_handler_t handler_;
10665  };
10666 
10667  struct write_completion_handler {
10668  write_completion_handler(
10669  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self,
10670  async_handler_t func,
10671  std::size_t num_of_messages,
10672  std::size_t expected)
10673  :self_(std::move(self)),
10674  func_(std::move(func)),
10675  num_of_messages_(num_of_messages),
10676  expected_(expected)
10677  {}
10678  void operator()(boost::system::error_code const& ec) const {
10679  if (func_) func_(ec);
10680  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
10681  self_->queue_.pop_front();
10682  }
10683  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
10684  !self_->connected_) {
10685  self_->connected_ = false;
10686  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
10687  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
10688  self_->queue_.pop_front();
10689  }
10690  return;
10691  }
10692  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
10693  self_->do_async_write();
10694  }
10695  }
10696  void operator()(
10697  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
10698  std::size_t bytes_transferred) const {
10699  if (func_) func_(ec);
10700  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
10701  self_->queue_.pop_front();
10702  }
10703  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
10704  !self_->connected_) {
10705  self_->connected_ = false;
10706  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
10707  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
10708  self_->queue_.pop_front();
10709  }
10710  return;
10711  }
10712  if (expected_ != bytes_transferred) {
10713  self_->connected_ = false;
10714  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
10715  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
10716  self_->queue_.pop_front();
10717  }
10718  throw write_bytes_transferred_error(expected_, bytes_transferred);
10719  }
10720  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
10721  self_->do_async_write();
10722  }
10723  }
10724  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self_;
10725  async_handler_t func_;
10726  std::size_t num_of_messages_;
10727  std::size_t expected_;
10728  };
10729 
10730  void do_async_write() {
10731  std::vector<as::const_buffer> buf;
10732  std::vector<async_handler_t> handlers;
10733 
10734  std::size_t total_const_buffer_sequence = 0;
10735  auto start = queue_.cbegin();
10736  auto end =
10737  [&] {
10738  if (max_queue_send_count_ == 0) return queue_.cend();
10739  if (max_queue_send_count_ >= queue_.size()) return queue_.cend();
10740  return
10741  start +
10742  static_cast<typename std::deque<async_packet>::const_iterator::difference_type>(max_queue_send_count_);
10743  } ();
10744 
10745  std::size_t total = 0;
10746  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
10747  auto const& elem = *it;
10748  auto const& mv = elem.message();
10749  auto size = mqtt::size<PacketIdBytes>(mv);
10750 
10751  if (max_queue_send_size_ != 0 && max_queue_send_size_ < total + size) {
10752  end = it;
10753  break;
10754  }
10755  total += size;
10756  total_const_buffer_sequence += num_of_const_buffer_sequence(mv);
10757  }
10758 
10759  buf.reserve(total_const_buffer_sequence);
10760  handlers.reserve(queue_.size());
10761 
10762  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
10763  auto const& elem = *it;
10764  auto const& mv = elem.message();
10765  auto const& cbs = const_buffer_sequence(mv);
10766  std::copy(cbs.begin(), cbs.end(), std::back_inserter(buf));
10767  handlers.emplace_back(elem.handler());
10768  }
10769 
10770  if (h_pre_send_) h_pre_send_();
10771 
10772  async_write(
10773  *socket_,
10774  buf,
10775  write_completion_handler(
10776  this->shared_from_this(),
10777  [handlers = std::move(handlers)]
10778  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
10779  for (auto const& h : handlers) {
10780  if (h) h(ec);
10781  }
10782  },
10783  static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(start, end)),
10784  total
10785  )
10786  );
10787  }
10788 
10789  void do_async_write(basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv, async_handler_t func) {
10790  // Move this job to the socket's strand so that it can be queued without mutexes.
10791  socket_->post(
10792  [self = this->shared_from_this(), mv = std::move(mv), func = std::move(func)]
10793  () {
10794  if (!self->connected_) {
10795  // offline async publish is successfully finished, because there's nothing to do.
10796  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::success));
10797  return;
10798  }
10799  self->queue_.emplace_back(std::move(mv), std::move(func));
10800  // Only need to start async writes if there was nothing in the queue before the above item.
10801  if (self->queue_.size() > 1) return;
10802  self->do_async_write();
10803  }
10804  );
10805  }
10806 
10807  static constexpr std::uint16_t make_uint16_t(char b1, char b2) {
10808  return
10809  static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
10810  ((static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b1) & 0xff)) << 8 |
10811  (static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b2) & 0xff)
10812  );
10813  }
10814 
10815 protected:
10816  bool clean_session_{false};
10817 
10818 private:
10819  std::unique_ptr<Socket> socket_;
10820  std::atomic<bool> connected_{false};
10821  std::atomic<bool> mqtt_connected_{false};
10822 
10823  char buf_;
10824  std::uint8_t fixed_header_;
10825  std::size_t remaining_length_multiplier_;
10826  std::size_t remaining_length_;
10827  std::vector<char> payload_;
10828 
10829  // MQTT common handlers
10830  pingreq_handler h_pingreq_;
10831  pingresp_handler h_pingresp_;
10832 
10833  // MQTT v3_1_1 handlers
10834  connect_handler h_connect_;
10835  connack_handler h_connack_;
10836  publish_handler h_publish_;
10837  puback_handler h_puback_;
10838  pubrec_handler h_pubrec_;
10839  pubrel_handler h_pubrel_;
10840  pubcomp_handler h_pubcomp_;
10841  subscribe_handler h_subscribe_;
10842  suback_handler h_suback_;
10843  unsubscribe_handler h_unsubscribe_;
10844  unsuback_handler h_unsuback_;
10845  disconnect_handler h_disconnect_;
10846 
10847  // MQTT v5 handlers
10848  v5_connect_handler h_v5_connect_;
10849  v5_connack_handler h_v5_connack_;
10850  v5_publish_handler h_v5_publish_;
10851  v5_puback_handler h_v5_puback_;
10852  v5_pubrec_handler h_v5_pubrec_;
10853  v5_pubrel_handler h_v5_pubrel_;
10854  v5_pubcomp_handler h_v5_pubcomp_;
10855  v5_subscribe_handler h_v5_subscribe_;
10856  v5_suback_handler h_v5_suback_;
10857  v5_unsubscribe_handler h_v5_unsubscribe_;
10858  v5_unsuback_handler h_v5_unsuback_;
10859  v5_disconnect_handler h_v5_disconnect_;
10860  v5_auth_handler h_v5_auth_;
10861 
10862  // original handlers
10863  close_handler h_close_;
10864  error_handler h_error_;
10865  pub_res_sent_handler h_pub_res_sent_;
10866  serialize_publish_message_handler h_serialize_publish_;
10867  serialize_v5_publish_message_handler h_serialize_v5_publish_;
10868  serialize_pubrel_message_handler h_serialize_pubrel_;
10869  serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler h_serialize_v5_pubrel_;
10870  serialize_remove_handler h_serialize_remove_;
10871  pre_send_handler h_pre_send_;
10872  is_valid_length_handler h_is_valid_length_;
10873  Mutex store_mtx_;
10874  mi_store store_;
10875  std::set<packet_id_t> qos2_publish_handled_;
10876  std::deque<async_packet> queue_;
10877  packet_id_t packet_id_master_{0};
10878  std::set<packet_id_t> packet_id_;
10879  bool auto_pub_response_{true};
10880  bool auto_pub_response_async_{false};
10881  bool disconnect_requested_{false};
10882  bool connect_requested_{false};
10883  std::size_t max_queue_send_count_{1};
10884  std::size_t max_queue_send_size_{0};
10885  mqtt_message_processed_handler h_mqtt_message_processed_;
10886  protocol_version version_{protocol_version::undetermined};
10887 };
10888 
10889 } // namespace mqtt

10891 #endif // MQTT_ENDPOINT_HPP
mqtt::endpoint::set_mqtt_message_processed_handler
void set_mqtt_message_processed_handler(mqtt_message_processed_handler const &h=mqtt_message_processed_handler())
Set custom mqtt_message_processed_handler. The default setting is calling async_read_control_packet_t...
Definition: endpoint.hpp:7624
mqtt::endpoint::async_publish_dup
